name: Rental unit in Placencia · ★4.98 · Studio · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Placencia Village is very much a tourist beach destination, but also truly a working village. The village is totally walkable. The neighborhood is very friendly, and full of locals, tourists, and expats. It is expected that you say "good morning" and "good evening" when passing people.  There are lots of children who you'll see walking to school or waiting for the bus every morning.
host_about:
We moved to Belize in 2017 from New Jersey to enjoy year-round sun, sea, and warm weather. After years of research and reconnaissance, working multiple jobs and saving as much as possible, we finally dropped our old life, quit those jobs, and moved to Belize.  We chose Placencia as our paradise, and bought this guesthouse within weeks of arriving.  Since then we have enjoyed adapting to the “Barefoot Perfect” lifestyle of the village. We love living in this warm community full of friendly faces and being within walking distance of everywhere we need to go.

Phil’s passion is health and fitness and appreciates being active outdoors year-round. While enjoying all the perks that Belize offers, he has not totally abandoned his prior career path and still works remotely as a physical therapist. 

Megan dabbles in real estate, indulges her creative side by writing a blog (Real Life Recess) and crafting, and is also a superb source of information on expat life, village happenings,  and unique experiences.

We live onsite on the top floor of the guesthouse. We are always available to answer questions, assist with recommendations, and ensure your stay is as relaxing and memorable as possible . Please feel free to approach us at any time!

name: Hotel in San Pedro · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
neighborhood_overview: Located near the best beach bars and dive shops!
host_about:
Hey, I'm Hailey. I'm a 30 something-year-old business owner living the dream in Belize. Originally came down in 2017 and I'm from Oklahoma.

My mother lives onsite in Cayo and I live onsite in San Pedro, so either of us may be floating around the property during your stay.

name: Bungalow in Cristo Rey · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Cristo Rey Village, Cayo, Belize is the perfect destination for nature-lovers of all ages. From its beautiful tropical diverse wildlife to its stunning river and foothills of Mountain Pine Ridge, this village offers a unique and breathtakingly beautiful experience. For those who love the outdoors, there is plenty to do. Enjoy a leisurely stroll through our lush jungle property, explore the crystal clear Macal river that flows by our property or take our kayak out for even more pristine nature viewing. You can also take a dip in the refreshing waters of the local waterfalls. For those who want to explore the local culture, visit the nearby Mayan ruins, or take a trip to nearby San Ignacio. There are plenty of activities for the adventurer in you, from ziplining to horseback riding. With so much to offer, Cristo Rey Village, Cayo, Belize is the perfect destination for you!

Lucky Dreamer Lodge is in a beautiful place to vacation, mostly because of all the wonderful Belizeans th
host_about:
Hi, we are Cheryl & Jeff, founders of Lucky Dreamer Lodge in San Ignacio Belize. 

Check us out online at @lucky_dreamer_lodge 

We have extensive experience in the hospitality industry with over 33 years of combined experience at Walt Disney World and another 10+ years of joint experience in owning/operating our own restaurant, Herb Farm, and Bed & Breakfast in the states.

We strive to exceed our guests' expectations!

name: Rental unit in San Ignacio · ★4.82 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: This Apartment is at the end of the main street , 90 Burns Avenue, in San Ignacio. On this street there is a section for pedestrians only where several restaurants and bars are located with seating on the pavement  where one can sit and watch passersby. Very close by one street across is the Welcome Center with more Kiosks selling food and drinks and where the Public Busses all arrive and leave from.  A little further on is the famous Farmers Market teaming with fresh vegetables and fruits. On Saturday this Market is literally like a bazzare with Folks selling all types of stuff from used clothing to equipment, plants, etc.

name: Boutique hotel in San Pedro · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview:
300 feet of White Sand Beachfront: You are literally seconds away from the ocean if you want to go and get your feet wet.
Large Freshwater Beachfront pool: Don’t want to swim in the ocean just yet? No problem! We have a large freshwater pool waiting just for you. Take a swim and simply let your cares melt away.
Hammocks & Loungers on the Beach: Sometimes all we want to do is take it all in. That is why we have our hammocks and Loungers right on the beach. For those days or moments where all you want to do is …. basically nothing. Take it all in, heck take a siesta while at it!
Thatched Roof Bar: No vacation is complete without having a few drinks first. Take a load off at our thatched roof bar and enjoy all the tropical drinks you want.
24 Hour Security: We are committed to your safety and security during your stay with us.
host_about:
Hi, 
I have been in the travel business for over a decade! 
I understand the ins and outs of travelings. I want to make your vacation comfortable and memorable. 
I am here to assist you for anything you need. 

Buen Viaje!

name: Boutique hotel in Placencia · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview:
Chabil Mar’s place is located in Placencia, Stann Creek District, Belize.

Chabil Mar is conveniently located 5 minutes drive from the Placencia local airport and daily life of Placencia Village, a traditional fishing Village, located at the end of the 16 mile long Placencia Peninsula.

Chabil Mar's full service property includes a restaurant and Roaming Butler service for dining and drinks. All Villas include full kitchens. Our staff can provide market purchases on your behalf and some restaurants in Placencia Village are available for delivery services to Chabil Mar for your convenience.
host_about: Chabil Mar Resort's Reservations Manager

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★4.81 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
We are located a 1/2 mile north of the bridge leaving San Pedro, Belize. Our neighborhood is more relaxed than the hustle and bustle of downtown but close enough that you are just a short drive from the many restaurants and activities located in town.
There are three restaurants in the immediate vicinity of the property. The on site bar and restaurant, The Dog House Sports Lounge, is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner (7am – 10pm every day). They have Belizean breakfast dishes and casual bar food and mixed drinks throughout the day.
Just to the north of our property (a 2 minute walk on the beach) is 303 Belize, an over the water bar and restaurant. They are open for lunch and dinner (every day of the week) and focus more on seafood. They have live music most evenings as well. Underneath 303 Belize, is Elite Adventures, a dive and snorkel shop.
Just south of our property is the Farmhouse Market and Cafe. They offer a wide selection of fresh coffees, juices/smoothies,
host_about:
Tres Cocos Resort @ The Cloisters, is a charming family-run establishment where island living meets modern comfort. 
We have fond childhood memories on the property before its transformation into a vacation rental oasis. 
Each condo is individually owned and thoughtfully appointed, ensuring a unique and personalized experience for our guests. We invite you to experience the warmth of Belizean hospitality in every detail during your stay with us.

name: Cabin in San Ignacio · ★4.45 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Lemon's Place is a 5 minute walk from the beautiful archeological site of Cahal Pech. Local restaurants, bars, stores, and gas station are all nearby as well.
host_about: I was born and raised in San Ignacio Town. I love photography, cooking and my beautiful country of Belize. Let me know if you need any advice when visiting and I'll be happy to help.

name: Home in Teakettle · 2 bedrooms · 7 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The Teakettle Villa is your home-away-from-home in Belize. It is within walking distance to the center of Teakettle Village. You can spend your days at nearby Mayan archaeological sites, the Mountain Pine Ridge Forest Reserve where there are water falls, trails and hiking.  Within hiking distance is the TKO Farms, a 912-acre exotic hardwood and citrus tree farm made up of towering Teak, Mahogany, Spanish cedar and Zircote trees. The Teakettle Villa is only 7 miles from Actun Tunichil Mukal (ATM), the most popular Mayan burial site in Western Belize. Directly east on the Western Highway is the Belize Zoo. There is canoeing and kayaking on the Belize River, only half a mile away.  Spend your evenings relaxing on the rooftop deck watching the sun set over the Mayan Mountain range, and wake-up to the sounds of the howling monkeys.

name: Home in Placencia · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: We do provide coffee for our guests, but your anything like me I love a good late and there is a great little out door coffee shop on the Placencia main road a min walk from the Loft called Brewed Awakenings, they make a great late, Mocha, hot or cold. Fresh smoothies, and an assortment of fresh baked goods. Or a morning stroll down the sidewalk to The Shack Beach Cafe' at the end of the pier has the best verity of fresh smoothies I've every had, and there breakfast is amazing not to mention the views!
host_about:
Hello, We are Rose and Nancy Vella, we are natives to Sonoma County California. We have known each other since 1977, and got legally married January 18, 2015 at our beautiful Bodega Head, with our 4 closest friends. We had our big wedding 5/15/15 for our family and friends. Rose bought our Belize home in 2011, as an investment and a retirement get away. We are both lovers of travel, traveling in our trailer, camping, going to SF Giants games, going to concerts, and old cars. Rose has been to Europe twice to spend time with her family in Malta. She has also traveled around Italy, Greece, Canada, England, Hawaii, Mexico,Belize, Costa Rica, and the caribbean.
Not to mention various places with in the US.  I'v been to Mexico, Hawaii and Belize. We own two 55 Chevy's and are avid car show participants. Rose drove me to school my sophomore year everyday in that car and we of course had some of or favorite wedding photos taken in our yellow and white 55. 
We take care of my 83 year old dad, nicknamed DADDY-O. So when we need some much needed time away, well you know where we head...... Thats right 
our lovey little casita in San Ignacio Belize. 
Roses motto is " Do It Once, Do It Right" 
So that's how she lives her life!
As for me..... Well my motto is " Everyday Is A Good Day, Some Are Just Better Than Others"

host_about: Velento Rentals-19 unique Properties on the Island of Caye Caulker, a quaint island surrounded by the second largest reef in the world. Top notch diving, snorkeling, fishing. Warm weather year round. Lots of beach restaurants/pubs within walking distance. All of our properties have amenities such as large swimming pools, private dock access, AC, wifi, and  palapas for relaxation. Great for Families, couples, or honeymooners.

name: Guesthouse in Valley Community · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 shared bath
neighborhood_overview:
Coming to stay with us is a full immersion in the Jungle. We have built this sanctuary to reconnect to nature and to enjoy a more slow-paced lifestyle. We are surrounded by nature and the closest town (Dangriga) is a 30 minutes car ride.

There is so much to do in Belize! Here are a few of our favorites located in the Stann Creek district specifically, within a stone's throw of our property:


Angel Falls Zip Line & Water Rappelling (5 miles away). Known as "The Largest Zip Line in Central America." Just a short drive from Sattva Land.

Billy Barquedier National Park and Waterfall (3 miles away). Easily accessible and a quick five-minute drive from Sattva Land.

Antelope Falls (25 miles away). This 1,000-foot waterfall involves an intermediate one-hour hike to the pools with an incredible view of the ocean. Accessible by bus (though you will need to walk about 4 miles from the highway).

Additionally, Placencia is a quaint beac

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★4.60 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
We are located a 1/2 mile north of the bridge leaving San Pedro, Belize. Our neighborhood is more relaxed than the hustle and bustle of downtown but close enough that you are just a short drive from the many restaurants and activities located in town.
There are three restaurants in the immediate vicinity of the property. The on site bar and restaurant, The Dog House Sports Lounge, is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner (7am – 10pm every day). They have Belizean breakfast dishes and casual bar food and mixed drinks throughout the day.
Just to the north of our property (a 2 minute walk on the beach) is 303 Belize, an over the water bar and restaurant. They are open for lunch and dinner (every day of the week) and focus more on seafood. They have live music most evenings as well. Underneath 303 Belize, is Elite Adventures, a dive and snorkel shop.
Just south of our property is the Farmhouse Market and Cafe. They offer a wide selection of fresh coffees, juices/smoothies,
host_about:
Tres Cocos Resort @ The Cloisters, is a charming family-run establishment where island living meets modern comfort. 
We have fond childhood memories on the property before its transformation into a vacation rental oasis. 
Each condo is individually owned and thoughtfully appointed, ensuring a unique and personalized experience for our guests. We invite you to experience the warmth of Belizean hospitality in every detail during your stay with us.

name: Condo in San Pedro · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
host_about: I have been living on San Pedro my whole life. I enjoy putting my feet in the sea and looking at natures best. i am now in charge of guest services for Tradewinds Paradise Villas. I am qualified to take care of all your needs during your entire trip. Our owner Mr. Bill Toonen has been here since 1986 and has a wealth of knowledge to share with you. I will be here to welcome you personally when you arrive. On a daily basis i can book any diving, fishing, snorkeling or mainland tours you may want to do. I can also recommend the best restaurants, shops and pubs. Of course most all of these things I have experienced myself.

If you do not feel like exploring, there is a delivery carrier to deliver food from several restaurants or stores for an additional cost.

name: Rental unit in San Pedro · ★4.50 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
We are located just south of the Boca Del Rio Bridge, we are just one curve away from the beach ( you can hear the waves crashing the reef..so soothing :) and we have the sea view and lagoon view.
Nearby we have a grocery stores, pharmacies, gym , bakery, fresh fruit and vegetable stalls, and of course not to forget the beach restaurants, bars, and tour shops .
behind us is residential area where you will see the locals and their homes, as well as the lagoon ( not safe to swim).
Laguna Drive is one of the most commuted streets since its the only road (aside from the beach) that leads to Boca del rio bridge ( needed to access north of the island), but don't be alarmed since the apartment is not on the ground floor the noise is basically non existent.

name: Condo in Placencia, Stann Creek District, Belize · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Located on the out-skirts of Placencia Village we are in a subdivision surrounded with canals.  Please see us on your favorite Earth apps to see the canal/ocean layout.  Our neighborhood is a mix of wealthy Belizeans, Americans, Canadians and British. Our area is SAFE to be outside at night, leave your things on the deck or just star gaze in the front yard.  Neighbors keep their dogs from barking and running loose. We have no crime in our area. Its  peaceful at night. We have the local fish Co-op in our area.  The airport is beside for small & private aircraft that do not fly much after dark.
host_about: I have been coming to Belize since 2006 to escape Kelowna, BC winters.  I spend several months and love the dual life-style and great people I meet along the way.  There are lots of home owners from Canada and the USA.  My rental is a charming cottage style condo that I have decided to share with my international guests.  It’s the first unit of my development.  Back in the early years I started my previous condo rental and was one of the first people to do vacation rentals.  It will be my pleasure to help you organize your trip and help you discover Belize and all the magnificent things here to enjoy.  Prepare to create some incredible memories!  “We are not a condo for the masses, but for a fortunate few who like to take in the beautiful, less travelled road!”
neighbourhood: Placencia, Stann Creek District, Belize, Stann Creek District, Belize

I am also a huge fan of the ocean and anything that starts with the letter “s”, scuba diving, swimming, snorkeling, and surfing. 

I have taken on this project in Belize to fulfill a lifelong dream of being able to travel while working. I look forward to offering you a once in a lifetime opportunity to explore the serenity of Ambergris Caye. 

I love meeting people from every corner of the earth and I am excited to host you travelers. I will do my best to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

name: Island in Belize City · ★4.89 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
host_about:
Bird's Isle Cabanas is one of the coziest unique spaces you'll find in the City with amazing views of the Caribbean Sea. It is located in the heart of the city, Albert Street, close to what is known as "Outa Town" with several shopping areas and is surrounded by historic buildings.  


The island host different entertainments which guests can enjoy such as Karaoke night and Happy Hour at our famous restaurant.

name: Hotel in Placencia · ★4.57 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview:
Julia’s, located right on the beach in the heart of Placencia Village, offers beachfront and beach view cabanas, an up and down duplex, full kitchen and kitchenette options, and boasts a fully fenced property, a pristine beach raked daily, and an unmatched view of the beautiful Caribbean Sea.

Please refer to the neighborhood description for this listing regarding our proximity to a lively beach bar.
host_about: I am a Belizean native, born and raised in the coastal town of Placencia. The units that we rent are named after my mother, Julia. She started this business back in the late 1980s.  We have survived several hurricanes and now the covid pandemic.  I am a wife and mother of 5 children. My primary job is a high school teacher and on the side, I manage the overall operations of the business for my parents who are now retired. We have a small staff of 2 individuals that are there to ensure your needs are met while you stay at Julia's.

name: Home in Caye Caulker · ★4.94 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Caye Caulker is truly paradise.  The island vibe is go slow so be prepared to be transported to pure bliss and relaxation.  The  island is approximately 5 miles long and 3 miles wide so you are essentially surrounded by the sea.
host_about: Canadian couple who love to travel and want to share their love of Caye Caulker with others.

name: Rental unit in Belize City · ★4.78 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in a friendly Belizean neighborhood so staying here will give a taste of Belizean living. No restaurants or noisy clubs are in the vicinity and transportation by car is the best way to get around.
We also have a local taxi driver by the name Chris that can take you anywhere you want to go.
To buy groceries on your way from the airport or to the restaurants located 5 to 7 minutes away.
host_about: I am a detail oriented person that loves fruits and flowers, when my guest come to the apartment they will find one or the two of them.

name: Villa in San Pedro, Belize · ★4.98 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Take the road less traveled, to the Habaneros region and find a private estate, on millionaire row, 9 miles north of San Pedro town on Ambergris Caye North. Discover, quaint and rustic restaurants, off-the-beaten path. Partner Restaurant just 50 yard walk South and Chat and Chill open on weekends, a 300 yard walk up the beach. Bonitos grocery, located just a quarter mile down the road, 4 miles to not so secret, secret beach, 15 mins golf cart ride south to a cluster of restaurants. We are just steps from the untouched turquoise ocean and ancient Mayan ruins. Become fully immersed in organic farm to table dining available for purchase in villa or outdoor dining, enjoy our 5 star personalized guest concierge experience, and find yourself only 200 feet from unspoiled fishing, snorkeling, scuba diving, and pristine white beaches.

- Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. - We
host_about:
US Air Force Veteran & working Tech professional who loves to travel and experience the world!! I lived in The Netherlands for 4 years--an amazing experience!
Favorite places to travel: Ambergris Caye, Belize & Santorini, Greece.
Favorite Band: A Day To Remember
Favorite Movie: Tommy Boy

name: Home in Hopkins · ★4.85 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Hopkins is a very friendly Garifuna village in the Stann Creek district of Belize. It is known for its laid-back vibe, wonderful restaurants and bars, and great location as a starting point for excursions into the Sea, the jungles, or the mountains. Chefs prepare top quality meals with local seafood (caught fresh daily around Hopkins), meats, dairy, and vegetables. The property is located a short bike/car/cart ride South of the village in the Sittee Point area.

I love to travel and read.
I have a catering business so cooking has always been a love of mine. 
Nana's Bnb is Gold Standard approved and I look forward to giving you a Gold Standard stay at my home.

host_about:
Hi, my name is Jordan!
My mission is to provide the service and quality you deserve!
I felt it was a necessity to provide Clean, Private, and Beautiful places for people to enjoy.
I am from Belize a gorgeous Central American Country filled with beaches and luscious jungles; an all around amazing place but I felt that when coming here there may be a few concerns.
I for one expect privacy and comfort and I'm sure you do as well!
This is where I adopted the mentality of paying attention to the client and their needs thus the Saftey, Privacy and Serenity idea was born and put into each property.

name: Cabin in Spanish Lookout · ★4.98 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: This cabin is central to many attractions in Belize. A thriving Mennonite community lies just around the corner. Take a 30 min drive to a few Maya ruins, or visit San Ignacio, a vibrant town much loved by tourists. Drive East or South to enjoy Belize's beautiful beaches. So much to explore in Belize! And when you're tired, come back to a comfortable place. Our neighbors are a great bunch. A lovely elderly couple across the road, and the Martin family  beside us.
host_about:
We are a family of three. Always looking for a new adventure or food to try.. especially cheese and coffee.
 We seek to serve the way Christ taught in his Word. 
    Meeting new people and learning about other cultures is always a joy. 
   We speak English, French, German, Plautdietch and Spanish.

name: Villa in San Pedro · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Villa Sapphire is located on the exclusive North End, which is coveted for its tranquility. The villa is located 6 miles north of town and offers privacy in a relaxed setting with 12 individual villas sharing a 500 foot beach, pier and newly renovated freshwater pool.

Stop next door to The Sundeck for drinks and a bonfire on Sundays, or take a short stroll down the beach in either direction to Rojo for the day or make reservations for dinner at Portofino and enjoy their complimentary boat pick up and drop off. We can also arrange for a private chef for your villa. We have connections with some of the best tour providers on the island and you can be picked up from our pier in front of the villa.

The second largest barrier reef is 1/4 mile offshore and you can fish off the dock! If barefoot luxury is on your wish list - Villa Sapphire is the answer!

name: Home in San Pedro, Ambergris Caye · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 4 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The island of Ambergris Caye, “La Isla Bonita”, is a popular tourist destination.

San Pedro is a quaint little town of about 18,000 residents that has retained its charm while handling the growing number of visitors. La Perla Azul is located 4.5 miles/7+ km south of the town core, which means you are away from the crowds yet still within reach of everything. Not only will you be able to enjoy a restful day on a quiet beach, you will have a quiet night as well – no bar or restaurant noise, just swaying coconut fronds and the occasional fish jumping in the water!

Town is not far away when you want to go in for some live music, shopping, restaurants, etc. But there are things relatively close by too, such as:
-Playa de Sala rooftop bar & restaurant: < 1 mile
-Stax Container Bar: 1 mile
-Happy's Tequileria & Black Orchid Restaurants: 2 miles
-Marin’s, a small grocery store: 2.2 miles

The Belize Barrier Reef, the longest in the western h
host_about:
I've lived most of my life in the U.S. (where I am from) but have also lived for a couple of months to up to two years in different countries: Germany, Spain, Australia, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, & Belize. Since 2011 I've been living a somewhat nomadic lifestyle while exploring, working & volunteering in new & old places in the Americas and Europe. It's a great way to keep learning!

In my travels I stumbled upon the opportunity to do something that I love -- helping vacation rental owners help people like you with their dream vacations on Ambergris Caye, Belize!

I also have a condo in Cartagena, Colombia; if you're looking for a 30+ night stay (to volunteer; learn Spanish, salsa dancing, or scuba diving; work remotely with a Caribbean view; escape the winter...) let me know!

'Pack for a Purpose' is an organization that links travelers who'd like to help fulfill wish lists of non-profits in developing countries. I partner with them with schools, community organizations & animal rescue groups in both Colombia & Belize. These groups would love to have your help!

Not yet an AirBNB member? Join via this referral link and save $$ on your first booking, maybe even for a stay in Cartagena or Belize! : www.airbnb.com/c/bsmalley

name: Cottage in San Pedro · ★4.94 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Located on Tarpon Bay— a small but growing community 4 miles south of downtown San Pedro in one of the safest areas on the island. A visit here is reminiscent of a slower time on the island. This Villa shares a semi private beach with over-water hammocks & beach chairs with our other home across the street.

Playa de Sala boutique hotel next door offers convenient access to both a restaurant and Beachfront Boat Bar plus occasional live entertainment. Other Resort facilities like pool & beach chairs are available for use with food or drink purchases. 15 minutes drive to a variety of food & drink options, groceries and bakery.

Explore Tarpon bay and its mangrove estuaries with the onsite paddle board or rent a kayak next door. Boat and dive Tour pickups can be arranged directly from our shared dock outfront.

Tarpon bay is well suited for kitesurfing and windsurfing directly from the beach out front If you have your own equipment.

Downtow
host_about: Take calculated risks and pursue your dreams! That's what we did when we fell in love with Belize and spontaneously bought land then designed and built our own tiny dream homes here.  We live and work on Cape Cod and as recent empty nesters we travel as often as possible to San Pedro--the land of sunshine and happiness.   Hope you will love our places as much as we do!
neighbourhood: San Pedro, Ambergris Caye, South, Belize

neighborhood_overview:
The caretaker, lives on the property with his 2 dogs, Buddy and Rex, to assist you during your stay. There are 2 cabanas and the cottage on the property for rent.
Our cottage is located on 400ft of oceanfront beach, just a bike or car ride away from the charming fisherman's village of Placencia Town where you will find many local shops, restaurants and beach bars. We are a 5 minute walk along the beach from luxury resorts like Laru Beya, Robert's Grove & Itzana where you can enjoy a meal or a tropical cocktail.

name: Villa in San Pedro · ★4.92 · 5 bedrooms · 6 beds · 4 baths
neighborhood_overview: Located 5.5 Miles North of San Pedro Town, La Perla del Caribe offers privacy in a relaxed setting with 12 individual villas sharing a 500 foot beach, pier and swimming pool. Nearby restaurants are walking distance. Or we can arrange private chef for your Villa. Tours can be arranged by the Guest Services staff on site and pick up on the pier in front of the villa. Your biggest decision of the day will be whether to go SCUBA diving to hunt Lion fish on the second largest barrier reef in the world, try snorkeling or just lounge by the beautiful swimming pool a few steps away.  If none of those feel right, hop on a golf cart to explore the island.
host_about:
La Perla Del Caribe features nine privately owned, custom designed villas available to guests seeking a truly private, upscale Belize vacation experience. These inviting, secluded vacation rentals dot four acres of lush undisturbed Caribbean beachfront. Each vacation home welcomes guests with a high-end, distinctly Mediterranean ambiance reflecting the local Belize heritage uniquely designed by each homeowner.

Escape to La Perla Del Caribe and find yourself just steps away from the pristine white sand coastline and famous Belize coral reef – recognized globally as one of the top dive sights in the world. Meanwhile, your vacation home is a scenic walk from some of the top culinary destinations in all of Ambergris Caye.

Prefer to hideaway in your private villa? Our onsite guest services manager can organize your very own private chef ready to bring the Belize flavor straight to your door.

Our picturesque property not only provides the perfect Caribbean hideaway, it’s recognized by a plethora of leading travel sites including TripAdvisor which tabbed La Perla Del Caribe with the coveted Certificate of Excellence.

La Perla Del Caribe features two, three, four and five bedroom beachfront villas all capturing the essence and beauty of a truly authentic Belize experience. Guests are treated to mahogany sun beds, artisan crafted furniture, private porches and a dazzling view of the Caribbean Sea.

name: Boutique hotel in San Pedro · ★3.89 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview: We are in the downtown area of San Pedro where several restaurants and nightlife happens so you are within walking distance from various attractions.

name: Cabin in San Ignacio · ★5.0 · Studio · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Santa Cruz area is an up-and-coming neighborhood just off the beaten path on the outskirts of town. Located; on the Santa Elena side of the twin towns (San Ignacio/Santa Elena) near supermarkets, gas stations, coffee shops, restaurants, cultural and adventure activities. You will see school children and local families in their daily routines.

We do recommend a 4-wheel drive if you are renting a vehicle, especially in the rainy season. Because you never know where your adventures will take you.

If you do not feel like exploring, there is a delivery carrier to deliver food from several restaurants or stores for an additional charge.

name: Home in San Ignacio · ★4.81 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood boasts the best views in town and is home to the  world famous Cahal Pech Mayan ruin. Great restaurants , bars and grocery stores are only a 5 to 10 minute walk away. Furthermore it is a safe and friendly neighborhood.
host_about:
Welcome to beautiful San Ignacio.
I am a retired accountant , born & grown in San Ignacio ! 

Breezy Panorama House sits on top of a hill allowing you to relax and admire the surrounding mountains with the historical Cahal Pech maya temples in its backyard!
You enjoy privacy as house is all  yours and enjoy taking in the view from the balcony.  

We are Gold Standard and 
I am fully vaccinated and  follow COVID  protocols !

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: Diamante is located on the South end of town and a stone’s throw from the island’s airstrip and next door to the famous, The Blue Water Grill. Right on the corner heading to the main street, there is Walk- Mart Supermarket where you can shop all variety of groceries. Infront of Walk Mart there is Carlo & Ernie’s Runway bar, enjoy a great meal while having the view of the San Pedro Airstrip. And looking for an ATM? At the Sancas Plaza which is in front of the Tropic air Airport (3mins walking from US) there is an ATM. Being located in the heart of San Pedro is convenient to our guest since you will have access to amazing restaurants with amazing views, steps away from all the activity in Town and from dive shops for a numerous list of excursions you can do.

name: Villa in San Pedro · ★4.97 · 6 bedrooms · 8 beds · 4 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The Estate is inside a walled and gated private space, tucked away behind the main road.

A short walk brings you to the main road where you will find some great restaurants and bars. Just across that main road you will find a path leading to the exquisite Caribbean Ocean!
Belize beaches are public and although many resorts are on the beach, anyone has access to the sand and surf. The palm-lined, sand beach is only 200 yards from the Azul Vista Villas. You will see the big waves breaking over the barrier reef only 1/2 mile out.

There is a large fruit stand about 300 yards to the north on the main street. To the south there are more locally oriented eating places for a taste of local cuisine, such as the infamous 'rice and beans and stewed chicken'.

For supermarket-type shopping, the Super Buy grocery store is a 5-minute walk north on the main street. Across from Super Buy is the local bakery, aptly named 'The Bakery'.

There's a snorkel
host_about:
Hi!
We are Robert and Tammi, an adventurous Canadian couple. We own this beautiful property in San Pedro, Ambergris Caye, Belize and we are excited to be able to share it with you!

When we are not on the island, we have a dedicated manager who lives in San Pedro and is able to assist with all your vacation needs.

name: Rental unit in San Pedro · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The island of Ambergris Caye, “La Isla Bonita”, is a popular tourist destination. You can get here from the mainland either via an 15 minute flight or a 90 minute boat trip.

San Pedro is a quaint little town of about 18,000 residents that has retained its charm while handling the growing number of visitors. La Perla Azul is located 4.5 miles/7+ km south of the town core, which means you are away from the crowds yet still within reach of everything. Not only will you be able to enjoy a restful day on a quiet beach, you will have a quiet night as well – no bar or restaurant noise, just swaying coconut fronds and the occasional fish jumping in the water!

Town is not far away when you want to go in for some live music, shopping, restaurants, etc. But there are things relatively close by too, such as:
-Playa de Sala rooftop bar & restaurant: < 1 mile
-Stax Container Bar: 1 mile
-Pelican Reef Grill, Happy's Tequileria & Black Orchid Restaurants: 2 miles
host_about:
I've lived most of my life in the U.S. (where I am from) but have also lived for a couple of months to up to two years in different countries: Germany, Spain, Australia, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, & Belize. Since 2011 I've been living a somewhat nomadic lifestyle while exploring, working & volunteering in new & old places in the Americas and Europe. It's a great way to keep learning!

In my travels I stumbled upon the opportunity to do something that I love -- helping vacation rental owners help people like you with their dream vacations on Ambergris Caye, Belize!

I also have a condo in Cartagena, Colombia; if you're looking for a 30+ night stay (to volunteer; learn Spanish, salsa dancing, or scuba diving; work remotely with a Caribbean view; escape the winter...) let me know!

'Pack for a Purpose' is an organization that links travelers who'd like to help fulfill wish lists of non-profits in developing countries. I partner with them with schools, community organizations & animal rescue groups in both Colombia & Belize. These groups would love to have your help!

name: Island in Dangriga · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Thatch Caye All-Inclusive Private Island  Perfectly located along the Belize Barrier Reef and just a short boat ride away from excursions and adventures, this island limits the number of guests to just 30 at a time, guaranteeing a unique experience. See all that Belize has to offer while staying on a private island.
host_about: Feel good about your choice in where to stay in Belize. Not only do we provide comfortable, safe accommodations close to jungle and ocean adventure, but you can expect to interact with some of the diverse cultures that make Belize special. Discover cultural immersion options and team members passionate about sharing their Belizean culture.

name: Hotel in Corozal · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 private bath
Hotel in Corozal · ★4.45 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
Campsite in Benque Viejo Del Carmen · Half-bath
neighborhood_overview:
Mama Tina's Medicinal RVs Campsite &Farm is located at the outskirts of our friendly "cool" and beautiful hometown just 3 minutes away by vehicle from the entrance of Benque Viejo Del Carmen. Moreover, we are just 15 minutes away from the magnificent Maya Temple Site (Archaeological sites) also known as the "Stone Lady" Xunantunich and 5 minutes away from our neighbour country Guatemala (Tikal). As a medicinal & livestock farm, we are currently upgrading and don't have electricity, but we guarantee our friends guest 100% nature ecotourism and as well adventurous tourism. Our medicinal & livestock farm is surrounded by the awesome beautiful tropical paradise rainforest of Belize, evergreen and fruit trees.
Furthermore, our friendly guests will appreciate, learn & experience over 50 different species of rainforest medicinal plants, evergreen and fruit trees. Moreover, guest will not only learn in our farm but will also experience the most awesome Vaca Platue Maya Mountains (nature
host_about: Outgoing and humble!  Nice to meet people! :) I love traveling and interacting & exploring the different cultures around the world.
neighbourhood: Benque Viejo Del Carmen, Cayo District, Belize

name: Boutique hotel in San Pedro, Ambergris Caye · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 shared bath
host_about: For the past 20 years, I and Hotel del Rio have been helping people enjoy San Pedro and the Reef. Jim

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: Miramar Villas Resort is located just south of San Pedro. In a quiet and safe neighbourhood. There are 3 restaurants close by and a local grocery store.  Other restaurants are a 10-minute drive and 20 minutes to the town center.

name: Condo in San Pedro · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
This beautiful complex is located 2.5miles south of town just off the paved town. South San Pedro is a safe and quiet community with the South Ambergris Caye Neighborhood Watch just footsteps away from Miramar Villas.

With 4 restaurants and a small grocery store in a close distance for your convenience. Just walk across the street and have dinner at Happy's Tequileria, or at Black Orchid Restaurant.

Drive to Some Place South Cafe/Bar and enjoy your favorite Mimosa or feeling like having a juicy hamburger you definitely need to go hang out at TOAST. Gaby the bartender will sure make sure you have a lovely meal and makes the best drinks.
If you feel like having an upscale adult dinner drive south to Playa De Sala adult only restaurant, where you will enjoy the beautiful beach and wonderful food.

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: Safe quiet area south of town. A 15 minute golf cart ride away from the center of town. Has 3 restaurants near by and a grocery store to stock up with essentials.  South is the home of the South Ambergris Caye neighborhood watch making this area the safest on the island.

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★4.83 · 3 bedrooms · 6 beds · 2.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: This complex is located 2.5miles south of town. South Ambergris Caye is one of the safest and quietest Neighborhood since it is the home to the South Ambergris Caye Neighborhood watch. There are restaurants nearby and a grocery Store to get your essentials.

name: Home in Caye Caulker · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Central location in the village, one block (250ft) from the sea. It is on a corner - of course! We are on the main street through the village, so on our block we have a shop and the clinic and other neighbours, in the next block north is where there are a few independent restaurants / cafes, and in the next block again is the heart of the village where it gets busier, the water taxis and there is more businesses than homes. That stretches north all the way to the split. To the south is gets quieter generally with more homes and fewer businesses.
host_about: Still loving Caye Caulker after 22 years with my critters! Amanda

name: Home in San Pedro · ★4.89 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Want to take a stroll? Breeze on down to the coffee shop for an iced coconut latte, then work it off in the yoga studio across the way! Check out the stall market for a light lunch, featuring everything from tacos to authentic Southern BBQ, but save your appetite for a high-end sushi meal at the stunning Jyoto restaurant! Explore the island on a golf cart or boat and tour the beautiful town of San Pedro, with an incredible selection of bars and restaurants and exciting activities!

Located in San Pedro Town within Mahogany Bay Village. The area is a private gated community with Restaurants, bars, and cafes.

South Ambergris Village guest does not have access to the Mahogany Bay Resort pool or private beach.

There are some ongoing developments within the Mahogany Bay community and due to this, we have adjusted the accommodation rates.Want to take a stroll? Breeze on down to the coffee shop for an iced coconut latte, then work it off in the yoga studio acr
host_about:
Hi my name is Elliott Budd, I am the director of M&B Management Ltd. I am born and raised in the "Belizean Jewel", Ambergris Caye, Belize. 

I have made a career in hospitality and have had the pleasure of managing a couple resorts. My true passion is to make everyone that we have visit our island enjoy it as much as I do! Whatever your dream adventure may involve, my team and I are here to make it happen! We provide concierge, front desk and reservation assistance. Unlike any other AirBnb property, we include these services FREE OF CHARGE!
neighbourhood: San Pedro, Ambergris Caye Belize, Belize

name: Villa in San Pedro · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
This unique vacation condo makes you want to simply walk around with your camera and make unforgettable memories.
The locals on the island are called San Pedranos. You will certainly feel the calm, friendly aura which makes you not wanting to head back home.
Our reliable staff host a lot of returned guests.
host_about:
Greetings from La Isla Bonita!

I’m an island girl that loves nature. I grew up here on Ambergris Caye in the town of San Pedro so you can call me an island expert.  Feel free to ask me any question, I will be happy to answer you. Travel and meeting people are my passion.  Between my staff and myself we will make sure that your stay with us in an enjoyable one.  Welcome to Ambergris Caye; Welcome to BELIZE.

name: Home in Placencia, Stann Creek District, Belize · 3 bedrooms · 5 beds · 2 baths
Cabin in Placencia · ★4.83 · 3 bedrooms · 6 beds · 3 baths
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

name: Guest suite in Ladyville · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Quiet Residential neighbourhood, just ten minutes from Belize City and 5 minutes away from the Phillip Godson International Airport. Walking distance to small convenient store, Three minutes drive to main supermarket.

name: Rental unit in Placencia · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Driftwood Gardens Guesthouse is located towards the top of village in a super convenient location, but set back from the main road so there is still some peace and tranquility.
The village is entirely walkable from the house (we don't own a car or golf cart). The lagoon is less than 30 second walk from the back of the house, and you can be at the beach with just 3 minute walk across the street.
host_about:
We moved to Belize in 2017 from New Jersey to enjoy year-round sun, sea, and warm weather. After years of research and reconnaissance, working multiple jobs and saving as much as possible, we finally dropped our old life, quit those jobs, and moved to Belize.  We chose Placencia as our paradise, and bought this guesthouse within weeks of arriving.  Since then we have enjoyed adapting to the “Barefoot Perfect” lifestyle of the village. We love living in this warm community full of friendly faces and being within walking distance of everywhere we need to go.

Phil’s passion is health and fitness and appreciates being active outdoors year-round. While enjoying all the perks that Belize offers, he has not totally abandoned his prior career path and still works remotely as a physical therapist. 

Megan dabbles in real estate, indulges her creative side by writing a blog (Real Life Recess) and crafting, and is also a superb source of information on expat life, village happenings,  and unique experiences.

We live onsite on the top floor of the guesthouse. We are always available to answer questions, assist with recommendations, and ensure your stay is as relaxing and memorable as possible . Please feel free to approach us at any time!

name: Bungalow in Placencia · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Located in a neighborhood of private residences.
host_about: Love to travel, especially to warm destinations (especially Belize).  Enjoy music and festivals.  Appreciate great local food, no chains. Married for 41 years to a great wife, Gaylyn.

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The island of Ambergris Caye, “La Isla Bonita”, is a popular tourist destination. You can get here from the mainland either via an 15 minute flight or a 90 minute boat trip.

San Pedro, the only town on the island, has retained its charm while handling the growing number of visitors. Miramar is located 2.5 miles/4 km south of the town core, which means you are away from the crowds yet still within easy reach of everything.

Town is not far away when you want to go in for some live music, shopping, restaurants, etc. But there are things close by too; here are a few things within walking distance of Miramar:

--Suya Tour operator (2 minute walk)
--Marin’s, a small grocery store (4 minute walk)
--A couple of nice restaurants (2-10 minute walk)
--Beach Bar & Grill (15 minute walk; breakfast, lunch, dinner, live music, outdoor bowling)

The Belize Barrier Reef, the longest in the western hemisphere, is just 1/2 mile (1 km) off shore.
host_about:
I've lived most of my life in the U.S. (where I am from) but have also lived for a couple of months to up to two years in different countries: Germany, Spain, Australia, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, & Belize. Since 2011 I've been living a somewhat nomadic lifestyle while exploring, working & volunteering in new & old places in the Americas and Europe. It's a great way to keep learning!

In my travels I stumbled upon the opportunity to do something that I love -- helping vacation rental owners help people like you with their dream vacations on Ambergris Caye, Belize!

I also have a condo in Cartagena, Colombia; if you're looking for a 30+ night stay (to volunteer; learn Spanish, salsa dancing, or scuba diving; work remotely with a Caribbean view; escape the winter...) let me know!

'Pack for a Purpose' is an organization that links travelers who'd like to help fulfill wish lists of non-profits in developing countries. I partner with them with schools, community organizations & animal rescue groups in both Colombia & Belize. These groups would love to have your help!

Not yet an AirBNB member? Join via this referral link and save $$ on your first booking, maybe even for a stay in Cartagena or Belize! : www.airbnb.com/c/bsmalley

name: Farm stay in Ontario Village · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Property is a 615 acre farm with lots to see and do, located close to Mennonite villages
host_about: George and Darla will be your hosts.  We strive to make your stay as comfortable.  We are knowledgeable about the areas attractions, dining, shopping and other recreational activities in the area.

name: Home in San Ignacio · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
host_about:
Before settling in Belize, I traveled extensively, and lived in Europe, the US and Mexico.  As an artist/designer and my partner a former professor of biology and ecology, we incorporate both our talents to ensure our guests will have an exhilarating and educational experience in Belize.
We offer a cozy and comfortable place in a safe neighborhood. After a day of exploring Maya Temples, Caves and the Tropical Forest , mellow out, and feel at home.  We like to make our guests as welcomed as we possibly can, in a country, which has much to offer. If you have any questions regarding requirements and regulations due to COVID-19 in Belize, we are here to answer them, and to be of assistance. Hope to see you soon.

name: Treehouse in Cayo District · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: We are located outside San Ignacio in Western Belize on the Macal River. We are surrounded by farms and nature with river and hiking trails nearby. San Ignacio is a short drive or canoe ride away! We are happy to announce that all guests can now enjoy our brand-new infinity pool as well!

name: Home in Corozal · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Corozal!  We're in Northern Belize, a quiet town but so much charm and character.  We are 10 minutes away from the Mexican border and you can stay with us the entire time while traveling the country
host_about: Dr. Mike and Shelley have lived full time in Belize since 2012. Dr. Mike practices in Corozal and Shelley is the president of the local Rotary Club. They are very active in the community and are a wealth of information for retirees and vacationers.

name: Condo in Stann Creek District · ★4.92 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: In the gated community of Naia only 4 minutes walk along the beach is the Naia Spa Resort located, which offers relaxing Spa treatments, a fitness center and 2 Restaurants as a nice addition to the neighborhood. Next door to the South lies Sirenian Bay Resort with Inky´s Mini Golf Course and Inky´s bar and Grill. Sirenian also offers a tennis and pickleball court, wine cellar, cocktail bar and a spa and fitness center.
host_about:
I am the Property Manager of The Villas at Cocoplum and will answer all your questions about your stay. Once you arrived I will meet and greet you and together with my staff, I will do everything to make your stay memorable and fantastic. 

Originally from Austria, I moved to Belize in 2008. I love to scuba dive, hike, travel and enjoy good food and company.

See you soon in sunny Belize :-)

name: Villa in San Pedro · ★4.67 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
This unique vacation unit makes you want to simply walk around with your camera and make unforgettable memories.

The locals on the island are called San Pedranos. You will certainly feel the calm, friendly aura which makes you not wanting to head back home.

Our reliable staff host a lot of returned guests.
host_about:
Greetings from La Isla Bonita!

I’m an island girl that loves nature. I grew up here on Ambergris Caye in the town of San Pedro so you can call me an island expert.  Feel free to ask me any question, I will be happy to answer you. Travel and meeting people are my passion.  Between my staff and myself we will make sure that your stay with us in an enjoyable one.  Welcome to Ambergris Caye; Welcome to BELIZE.

name: Resort in San Pedro · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
Rental unit in Belize City · ★4.94 · Studio · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Our Apartments are located in the safe and quiet residential area of Belize City. You will be only 10 minutes walk from popular restaurants such as Sahara, coffee shop and frozen yogurt cafe Yogobean, yummy Moe's pizza, and night club/bar Social Lounge. Best Western hotel with its' traditional restaurant and full
Bar is just around the corner (under 10 minutes walk). On a sunny day you can purchase a day pass to Best Western's pool! Or go to Old Belize instead, where fun beach, marina, museum on a train, gift shop and even a food court with variety of restaurants await you (10 mins drive from us). Downtown with bars and more Restaurant options is just 10 mins drive from us. Water taxi - same distance. Airport - 15 minutes away. And the area here is really safe even at night. We are located on the north side of town, very far from dangerous streets and alleys, that all are in the old part of Belize city on the south side.
host_about: Ukraine will always have my heart, but Belize is my new home since recently and i love it. I do lash extensions right upstairs at my home, as well as work as a traveling makeup artist and photographer, and due to my frequent travels,  I always learn something new about this tiny country, it's culture, places and people. I try to make my guests happy and improve amenities and service whenever i can!  I and my helpers take extra time making sure apartments are tidy. We are still renovating our property as we got it in pretty bad shape and Hurricanes and rainy seasons do not make this easy! In our nearest plans is to build a pool and finish landscape that was destroyed by last hurricane Lisa, but despite the challenges, our home is getting more and more beautiful day by day. Hope you will enjoy staying with us!

Our Apartments are located in the safe and quiet residential area of Belize City. You will be only 10 minutes walk from popular restaurants such as Sahara, coffee shop and frozen yogurt cafe Yogobean, yummy Moe's pizza, and night club/bar Social Lounge. Best Western hotel with its' traditional restaurant and full
Bar is just around the corner (under 10 minutes walk). On a sunny day you can purchase a day pass to Best Western's pool! Or go to Old Belize instead, where fun beach, marina, museum on a train, gift shop and even a food court with variety of restaurants await you (10 mins drive from us). Downtown with bars and more Restaurant options is just 10 mins drive from us. Water taxi - same distance. Airport - 15 minutes away. And the area here is really safe even at night. We are located on the north side of town, very far from dangerous streets and alleys, that all are in the old part of Belize city on the south side.
host_about: Ukraine will always have my heart, but Belize is my new home since recently and i love it. I do lash extensions right upstairs at my home, as well as work as a traveling makeup artist and photographer, and due to my frequent travels,  I always learn something new about this tiny country, it's culture, places and people. I try to make my guests happy and improve amenities and service whenever i can!  I and my helpers take extra time making sure apartments are tidy. We are still renovating our property as we got it in pretty bad shape and Hurricanes and rainy seasons do not make this easy! In our nearest plans is to build a pool and finish landscape that was destroyed by last hurricane Lisa, but despite the challenges, our home is getting more and more beautiful day by day. Hope you will enjoy staying with us!

name: Guesthouse in San Ignacio · ★4.91 · 1 bedroom · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in the Cayo Vista area on the edge of San Ignacio. We are 2.2 km to Burns Ave/Downtown, the Welcome Center and the Farmers Market, 1.8 km to the Princess Casino and the Green Iguana Conservation Project. We are approx 1.5 km to Cahal Pech Ruins. Rolson's Cocina Cantina is less than 0.5 km and Xunantunich Ruins is 9 km away.

Our property is quiet and peaceful. You will not be kept awake at night by barking dogs, or woken up at the crack of dawn by crowing roosters!

Although we are still in San Ignacio you feel immersed in nature.
host_about: Belizean/Canadian couple living in San Ignacio, Belize. We love to travel and have set up our vacation rentals just as we would want them if we were the guests!

name: Cabin in Placencia · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

name: Condo in Placencia · ★4.94 · 6 bedrooms · 7 beds · 4 baths
neighborhood_overview: In the gated community of Naia only 4 minutes walk along the beach is the Naia Spa Resort located, which offers relaxing Spa treatments, a fitness center and 2 Restaurants as a nice addition to the neighborhood. Next door to the South lies Sirenian Bay Resort with Inky´s Mini Golf Course and Inky´s bar and Grill. Sirenian also offers a tennis and pickleball court, wine cellar, cocktail bar and a spa and fitness center.
host_about:
I am the Property Manager of The Villas at Cocoplum and will answer all your questions about your stay. Once you arrived I will meet and greet you and together with my staff, I will do everything to make your stay memorable and fantastic. 

Originally from Austria, I moved to Belize in 2008. I love to scuba dive, hike, travel and enjoy good food and company.

See you soon in sunny Belize :-)

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★4.50 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The island of Ambergris Caye, “La Isla Bonita”, is a popular tourist destination. You can get here from the mainland either via an 15 minute flight or a 90 minute boat trip.

San Pedro, the only town on the island, has retained its charm while handling the growing number of visitors. Miramar is located 2.5 miles/4 km south of the town core, which means you are away from the crowds yet still within easy reach of everything.

Town is not far away when you want to go in for some live music, shopping, restaurants, etc. But there are things close by too; here are a few things within walking distance of Miramar:

--Suya Tour operator (2 minute walk)
--Marin’s, a small grocery store (4 minute walk)
--A couple of nice restaurants (2-10 minute walk)
--Beach Bar & Grill (15 minute walk; breakfast, lunch, dinner, live music, outdoor bowling)

The Belize Barrier Reef, the longest in the western hemisphere, is just 1/2 mile (1 km) off shore.
host_about:
I've lived most of my life in the U.S. (where I am from) but have also lived for a couple of months to up to two years in different countries: Germany, Spain, Australia, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, & Belize. Since 2011 I've been living a somewhat nomadic lifestyle while exploring, working & volunteering in new & old places in the Americas and Europe. It's a great way to keep learning!

In my travels I stumbled upon the opportunity to do something that I love -- helping vacation rental owners help people like you with their dream vacations on Ambergris Caye, Belize!

I also have a condo in Cartagena, Colombia; if you're looking for a 30+ night stay (to volunteer; learn Spanish, salsa dancing, or scuba diving; work remotely with a Caribbean view; escape the winter...) let me know!

'Pack for a Purpose' is an organization that links travelers who'd like to help fulfill wish lists of non-profits in developing countries. I partner with them with schools, community organizations & animal rescue groups in both Colombia & Belize. These groups would love to have your help!

Not yet an AirBNB member? Join via this referral link and save $$ on your first booking, maybe even for a stay in Cartagena or Belize! : www.airbnb.com/c/bsmalley

name: Guesthouse in San Pedro · ★4.95 · Studio · 1 bed · 1 bath
Home in Belize City · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Private Island
host_about: Tarpon Sands is a two (2) acre private island with stunning reef and sea views that is a mere 20 minute boat ride from Belize City. The villa is a three (3) bedroom three (3) bathroom home.  It sleeps six (6) but can accommodate eight (8) with pull out queen couch if requested.  Maximum capacity is twelve (12) people and must be arranged prior to reservation.

name: Villa in San Pedro, Belize · ★4.96 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Take the road less traveled, to the Habaneros region and find a private estate, on millionaires row, 9 miles north of San Pedro town on Ambergris Caye North. Discover, quaint and rustic restaurants, off-the-beaten path. Restaurants available just South of us and Chat and Chill is open on weekends, just a 300 yard walk up the beach. Bonitos Grocery is a quarter mile down the road. We are just steps from the untouched turquoise ocean and ancient Mayan ruins. Become fully immersed in organic farm to table dining available for in villa or outdoor dining, enjoy our personalized guest concierge experience, and find yourself only 200 feet from unspoiled fishing, snorkeling, scuba diving, and pristine white beaches.

- Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. - We now have a seaweed barrier system in place to limit the effects on our shores. During heavy production seasons we clean
host_about:
US Air Force Veteran & working Tech professional who loves to travel and experience the world!! I lived in The Netherlands for 4 years--an amazing experience!
Favorite places to travel: Ambergris Caye, Belize & Santorini, Greece.
Favorite Band: A Day To Remember
Favorite Movie: Tommy Boy

Hotel in Caye Caulker · ★4.94 · 6 bedrooms · 6 beds · 6 shared baths
neighborhood_overview: We are in the developing yet secluded north island of Caye Caulker.  Hop on a complimentary bike and explore. The north island features 3 restaurants/bars. Boat transfers to the village of caye caulker can be arranged at a small expense to the guest.

name: Condo in Belize · ★4.64 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Caye Caulker is a popular destination for scuba drivers, snorkelers, kite surfing, anglers and tourists who just want beach oriented relaxation at budget prices. Although in the past it was a sleepy fishing community, this fun loving island is today known more for its exotic tours to the world's 2nd largest Barrier Reef as well as the famous Hol Chan Reserve. Take  ferry to the Northside Beach or Blu Zen and enjoy the elegant services offered. Take pleasure in visiting Iguana Reef to experience the breathtaking sunset view while catching sight of the seahorses and stingrays.
host_about:
All my Listings are located at Popeyes Beach Condos, Caye Caulker (Formerly known as Coconut Beach Hotel)
Welcome!

name: Condo in San Pedro · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
Cottage in Cristo Rey · ★4.97 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Alma del Rio is located 2 miles from Santa-Elena towards the Pine Ridge reserve. Though a sleepy road, before you reach our tranquil home there are several great attractions - you will pass cool M farm where you can purchase fresh milk and Yogurt,  Eden Valley Mayan kitchen to taste delicious locally made chocolate, 'The bluffs' bar and grill for great food, drinks and live music, Maya mountain lodge that only uses organic, fresh, local produce in their menu (vegan options available too!). 2 Min drive from our house you can find a magical waterfall. In San Antonio village, we highly recommend trying the the women's co-op restaurant -excellent  traditional, hearty Mayan dishes that are some of the best in Belize.
host_about:
Alma del Rio, the 'soul of the river', is named after our little Alma Sophia, who was born here in Belize and is raised among it's diverse nature and culture. 
We've been living in Belize for over 9 years. In the first 2, we managed a luxury island resort and presently own a business introducing and distributing renewable energy products. We bring into Alma del Rio all we know and believe in - professional hospitality and environmental awareness.   
We will be more than happy to help you get around, visit the best destinations and plan your trip according to your preferences and budget. We know the hospitality industry in Belize well, and will be glad to share our knowledge with you. 
Have a wonderful day!
Tom, Hadas & Alma

name: Home in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 3.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
San Pedro Town is a lovely small, former fishing village on the island of Ambergris Caye in the country of Belize.

The island, called a Caye (KEY) sits on the Great Mesoamerican Barrier Reef a World Heritage site and home to stunning corals and abundant marine life. The reef has many world famous dive sites like the Blue Hole and The Aquarium to name a few. Cruise around on a Golf cart or take a sail or just relax and enjoy the friendly people, great food and laid back life of the Caye.
host_about: Welcome to Belize! I have made Belize my home for for over 20 years and love the people, the places and culture that make up this truly unique slice of heaven. I know when you come here you will also fall in love with Belize and there is no better place to start your journey then at our Villas. Come, relax and have a chat!

name: Villa in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 5 bedrooms · 5 beds · 4 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The Reef and Beach
The Barrier Reef brings many adventures and much beauty. The ocean waves do not crash on the shore. They break on the reef. Because of this the shore line of the entire island is coral sand, and the first 300' or so of sea is a combination of sand and turtle grass. This is a critical part of the eco-system and is protected by Belize Environmental Laws.

We are only a short drive from Secret Beach, in fact our neighbourhood is the closest reef side neighbourhood to Secret Beach.

Restaurants/Bars
The following are all within one mile of El Gran Castillo de Arena.

Rojo Beach Bar is a casual spot that has been awarded the only restaurant and resort in the country with a Fodor’s choice 8 years running. They are located within a 5-minute walk north. Serving food from 12pm-3pm and 6pm-9pm. No reservations accepted or needed.

Mambo at Mata Chica is located about a 7-minute walk north of El Castillo de Arena. They serve nor

name: Home in San Pedro · ★4.36 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: We are the big yellow building on the beach. There is a HUGE sign you can not miss that says "Flip Flop Inn". You won't miss it.
host_about: Hi there! My name is Faith. I grew up on the island of San Pedro, Belize since I was 4 years old. I knew from such a young age that I wanted to show my little island to the world by opening either a bed and breakfast or boutique hotel. For now, I own a vacation home. Flip Flop Inn is my first ever project right on the beach in the heart of San Pedro Town. I can't wait to meet you all and show you why I fell in love with Belize.

name: Home in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 4 baths
Resort in San Ignacio · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview: Approx. 5 minutes walk from down town,  the San Ignacio Resort is a boutique hotel which brings together contemporary style, comfort and a scenic location in central San Ignacio. The property benefits from a refreshing outdoor swimming pool, award-winning restaurant and the highly regarded Green Iguana Conservation Project. Victor Galves Stadium is a six-minute stroll from the hotel, while the highly regarded Cahal Pech Archaeological Reserve is 13 minutes away on foot. Xunantunich Mayan Ruins is a 12-kilometre journey.

name: Condo in Caye caulker · ★3.43 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Caye Caulker is a popular destination for scuba divers, snorkelers, anglers, and tourists who just want beach- oriented relaxation at budget prices. Although in the past it was sleepy fishing community, this fun loving island is today known more for its exotic tours to the world's 2nd largest Barrier Reef as well as the famous Hol Chan Marine Reserve. Take a ferry to the northside of the island and make a stop at Northside Beach or Blu Zen and enjoy the elegant services offered. Take pleasure in visiting Iguana Reef to experience the breathtaking sunset view while catching sight of the seahorses and stingrays.
host_about:
Hi , my name is Brandon and my Husband is Adam and we hope to be your host on the magical island of Caye Caulker . We fell in love  with this little island the first time we came here. Now, we are so happy to share our little piece  of this  paradise with you.  If you have the time, read our back ground story  of how we came to be. In mean time cheers to everyone!!! 

All my Listings are located at Popeyes Beach Condos, Caye Caulker which is now officially Gold Standard Certified! Thanks to our Amazing Team.

name: Cabin in Caye Caulker · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bath
Rental unit in Placencia · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
host_about: ex-pat from Pt Reyes, CA, living in Placencia, Belize for many years, as well as yearly traveller to all parts of the world. I designed and built my property with custom mosaic tilework, lush tropical gardens offering Bananas, Coconuts, Mangoes, Papaya, Star & Passion fruits and more for guests to pick & enjoy with adjacent compost to feed our soil-enjoy many aspects of life, especially all living beings, yoga, meditation, reading, live music and performance-LOVE PUNTA!, gardening, cooking & baking, biking, hiking, kayaking, swimming, snorkeling, and travelling to distant places, meeting like minded people who appreciate life and all it's wonders....enjoy welcoming guests to Placencia and sharing my love of Belize and her varied people and awesome sites.

host_about: Dr. Mike and Shelley have lived full time in Belize since 2012. Dr. Mike practices in Corozal and Shelley is the president of the local Rotary Club. They are very active in the community and are a wealth of information for retirees and vacationers.

name: Cottage in Cristo Rey · ★5.0 · 4 bedrooms · 6 beds · 3 baths
neighborhood_overview: Alma del Rio is located 2 miles from Santa-Elena towards the Pine Ridge reserve. Though a sleepy road, before you reach our tranquil home, there are several great attractions - you will pass cool M farm where you can purchase fresh milk and Yogurt, Eden Valley Mayan kitchen to taste delicious locally made chocolate, 'The bluffs' bar and grill for great food, drinks and live music, Maya mountain lodge that only use organic, fresh, local produce in their menu (vegan options available too!). 2 Min drive from our house you can find a magical waterfall. In San Antonio village, we highly recommend trying the the women's co-op restaurant - the best in traditional, hearty Mayan dishes that are some of the best in Belize.
host_about:
Alma del Rio, the 'soul of the river', is named after our little Alma Sophia, who was born here in Belize and is raised among it's diverse nature and culture. 
We've been living in Belize for over 9 years. In the first 2, we managed a luxury island resort and presently own a business introducing and distributing renewable energy products. We bring into Alma del Rio all we know and believe in - professional hospitality and environmental awareness.   
We will be more than happy to help you get around, visit the best destinations and plan your trip according to your preferences and budget. We know the hospitality industry in Belize well, and will be glad to share our knowledge with you. 
Have a wonderful day!
Tom, Hadas & Alma

Treehouse in San Ignacio · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 shared baths
neighborhood_overview: Family homes, hotel zone, river swimming, village life.
host_about: Spending the night under a 100 foot guanacaste tree in a tree house is like nothing else! The lodge is surrounded on three sides by the Mopan River, so a refreshing swim in clear water is never far away and the wildlife of the area abound. Yes, parrots and toucans are in great number here, along with hundreds of other types of birds, making this an ideal location for bird watching.  Coati, agouti, otter, and the giant green iguana are among the many animals which are regular visitors to our beautiful gardens which, though lush and exotic, are virtually mosquito free.

name: Cabin in Middlesex · ★5.0 · 4 bedrooms · 7 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Coming to stay with us is a full immersion in the Jungle. We have built this sanctuary to reconnect to nature and to enjoy a more slow-paced lifestyle. We are surrounded by nature and the closest town (Dangriga) is a 30 minutes car ride.

There is so much to do in Belize! Here are a few of our favorites located in the Stann Creek district specifically, within a stone's throw of our property:


Angel Falls Zip Line & Water Rappelling (5 miles away). Known as "The Largest Zip Line in Central America." Just a short drive from Sattva Land.

Billy Barquedier National Park and Waterfall (3 miles away). Easily accessible and a quick five-minute drive from Sattva Land.

Antelope Falls (25 miles away). This 1,000-foot waterfall involves an intermediate one-hour hike to the pools with an incredible view of the ocean. Accessible by bus (though you will need to walk about 4 miles from the highway).
