name: Cabin in Placencia · ★4.92 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, safe peaceful neighborhood. Ohana is right on the beach and feels very private. Bars and restaurants are at walking distance but far enought ot not be bothered by the noise or the traffic. The Placencia Beach club and the Chillpoint Cafe are our neighbours. Top Value supermarket, Placencia Pharmacy and Atlantic Bank ATM are at 3 minutes walking.
host_about: Enjoying the privilege of living in the tropics for the last 20 years of my life and more especially in Belize since 2008 with my husband and 4 kids.  I am engineer in tropical agronomy which gave me the opportunity to travel the world and manage various projects and businesses. Amongst all the places were we lived, we find Belize very special, we fell in love with its peaceful diversity, its diverse and scenic landscapes, its climate, its people, its laid back environment... we love sharing this secret and have no doubt you will love it just as much as we do !

name: Cottage in Punta Gorda · 6 bedrooms · 9 beds · 7 baths
neighborhood_overview: The Toledo District has so much to offer any traveler. We assist with tour packages as well as offer recommendations for self-guided tours - Go snorkeling, fly fishing, visit Maya Archeological sites, jungle hike, cave and kayak, river-tube and zip-line, head to the Belize Spice Farm or visit a cacao farm. Depending on interests, budget and preferred travel style there are options for all!
host_about: Hi, I'm Allison Gonzalez and I'm an American national. My family and I moved to Belize in 2016, acquired Hickatee Cottages and operated it as a B&B lodge for 5 years. Now, we are happy to welcome our guests to our jungle property rental so you can enjoy the entire place! We are here to assist you with your travel planning, what activities to see and do in the Toledo District and will ensure you have the customer service of a lodge but privacy of having your own home.

name: Bungalow in Cristo Rey · ★4.75 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Cristo Rey Village, Cayo, Belize is the perfect destination for nature-lovers of all ages. From its beautiful tropical diverse wildlife to its stunning river and foothills of Mountain Pine Ridge, this village offers a unique and breathtakingly beautiful experience. For those who love the outdoors, there is plenty to do. Enjoy a leisurely stroll through our lush jungle property, explore the crystal clear Macal river that flows by our property or take our kayak out for even more pristine nature viewing. You can also take a dip in the refreshing waters of the local waterfalls. For those who want to explore the local culture, visit the nearby Mayan ruins, or take a trip to nearby San Ignacio. There are plenty of activities for the adventurer in you, from ziplining to horseback riding. With so much to offer, Cristo Rey Village, Cayo, Belize is the perfect destination for you!

Lucky Dreamer Lodge is a beautiful place for a vacation mostly because of the Belizeans that welcome gues
host_about:
Hi, we are Cheryl & Jeff, founders of Lucky Dreamer Lodge in San Ignacio Belize. 

Check us out online at @lucky_dreamer_lodge 

We have extensive experience in the hospitality industry with over 33 years of combined experience at Walt Disney World and another 10+ years of joint experience in owning/operating our own restaurant, Herb Farm, and Bed & Breakfast in the states.

We strive to exceed our guests' expectations!

host_about:
When looking for luxury accommodations in sandy Caye Caulker, Barefoot Caye Caulker Hotel provides the perfect combination of Cozy and Contemporary Suites you deserve on your vacation with plenty of on-site amenities for your convenience and comfort.

Located in the heart of the island’s Front Street, our Newly Renovated property has all the tropical vibes you need in our Six Ocean View Rooms with Private Balcony and Eight Courtyard Units overlooking our brand new pool and deck, including two fully-equipped 2-Bedroom Suites with an open concept living and kitchen space. The airy and open design of our modern hotel surrounded by lush greenery gives our guests the feeling of a private oasis with the convenience of accessing the island’s best restaurants, shops and hot spots the minute you leave the premises.

Come Visit us in Paradise, and don’t forget to Go Barefoot & Go Slow!

name: Villa in San Pedro · 8 bedrooms · 11 beds · 7.5 baths
Condo in San Pedro · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
We are located a 1/2 mile north of the bridge leaving San Pedro, Belize. Our neighborhood is more relaxed than the hustle and bustle of downtown but close enough that you are just a short drive from the many restaurants and activities located in town.
There are three restaurants in the immediate vicinity of the property. The on site bar and restaurant, The Dog House Sports Lounge, is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner (7am – 10pm every day). They have Belizean breakfast dishes and casual bar food and mixed drinks throughout the day.
Just to the north of our property (a 2 minute walk on the beach) is 303 Belize, an over the water bar and restaurant. They are open for lunch and dinner (every day of the week) and focus more on seafood. They have live music most evenings as well. Underneath 303 Belize, is Elite Adventures, a dive and snorkel shop.
Just south of our property is the Farmhouse Market and Cafe. They offer a wide selection of fresh coffees, juices/smoothies,
host_about:
Tres Cocos Resort @ The Cloisters, is a charming family-run establishment where island living meets modern comfort. 
We have fond childhood memories on the property before its transformation into a vacation rental oasis. 
Each condo is individually owned and thoughtfully appointed, ensuring a unique and personalized experience for our guests. We invite you to experience the warmth of Belizean hospitality in every detail during your stay with us.

name: Villa in San Pedro · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Paradise Villas is just 5 minutes walk from grocery store, banks, tour companies and famous Palapa Bar and Grill and Sand Bar.
host_about:
Greetings from La Isla Bonita!

I’m an island girl that loves nature. I grew up here on Ambergris Caye in the town of San Pedro so you can call me an island expert.  Feel free to ask me any question, I will be happy to answer you. Travel and meeting people are my passion.  Between my staff and myself we will make sure that your stay with us in an enjoyable one.  Welcome to Ambergris Caye; Welcome to BELIZE.

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 8 beds · 2.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The island of Ambergris Caye, “La Isla Bonita”, is a popular tourist destination. You can get here from the mainland either via an 15 minute flight or a 90 minute boat trip.

San Pedro, the only town on the island, has retained its charm while handling the growing number of visitors. Miramar is located 2.5 miles/4 km south of the town core, which means you are away from the crowds yet still within easy reach of everything.

Town is not far away when you want to go in for some live music, shopping, restaurants, etc. But there are things close by too; here are a few things within walking distance of Miramar:

--Suya Tour operator (2 minute walk)
--Marin’s, a small grocery store (4 minute walk)
--A couple of nice restaurants (2-10 minute walk)
--Beach Bar & Grill (15 minute walk; breakfast, lunch, dinner, live music, outdoor bowling)

The Belize Barrier Reef, the longest in the western hemisphere, is just 1/2 mile (1 km) off shore.
host_about:
I've lived most of my life in the U.S. (where I am from) but have also lived for a couple of months to up to two years in different countries: Germany, Spain, Australia, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, & Belize. Since 2011 I've been living a somewhat nomadic lifestyle while exploring, working & volunteering in new & old places in the Americas and Europe. It's a great way to keep learning!

In my travels I stumbled upon the opportunity to do something that I love -- helping vacation rental owners help people like you with their dream vacations on Ambergris Caye, Belize!

I also have a condo in Cartagena, Colombia; if you're looking for a 30+ night stay (to volunteer; learn Spanish, salsa dancing, or scuba diving; work remotely with a Caribbean view; escape the winter...) let me know!

'Pack for a Purpose' is an organization that links travelers who'd like to help fulfill wish lists of non-profits in developing countries. I partner with them with schools, community organizations & animal rescue groups in both Colombia & Belize. These groups would love to have your help!

Not yet an AirBNB member? Join via this referral link and save $$ on your first booking, maybe even for a stay in Cartagena or Belize! : www.airbnb.com/c/bsmalley

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
San Pedro, Ambergris Caye is accessible from the mainland or International airport by a 15-minute flight, private helicopter transfer or water taxi. The island is popular for world class diving, fishing and for the largest barrier reef in the Northern Hemisphere.

Sunset Caribe is an easy 1.5 mile golf cart ride North of San Pedro. You will experience the beach luxury of Northern Ambergris Caye while being very close to downtown San Pedro. There are several popular attractions, beach bars and restaurants all around Sunset Caribe!

On our 'Caribeville' property: Beach Basket (small grocery store); Rain Restaurant, Aqua Belize Restaurant (Sushi), Spa/Salon, & San Pedro Urgent Care Clinic.

Restaurants/Bars around our property: Truck Stop Belize, Stellas Sunset, Marbucks, Aji Restaurant, Akbol, PUR Cabanas & Taco Bar, Rum Dog, Crocs Sunset Sports Bar, The Garage, 303 Belize, Tres Cocos Waffles & Smokehouse...
host_about: My husband and I were born, raised and still live where winters are COLD.  Therefore, we love traveling to our "home away from home" where the weather is just as beautiful as the people!  We hope you make yourself at home and enjoy island living to the fullest!

name: Home in Hopkins Village · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
On the beach in the center of Hopkins, a small fishing village of approximately 1200 people, the Mellow Yellow Beach House is just a few steps from the grocery store, liquor store, several excellent restaurants, and many options for evening entertainment. This central location makes it easy to explore the Village from one end to the other. Should you want to venture further, bicycles are provided, and golf carts and cars are available to rent.

Hopkins is in the Stann Creek district of Belize, Central America. Centrally located when it comes to things to see and do. It is situated behind the second largest barrier reef in the world and on the Caribbean Sea. Therefore, all water activities such as snorkelling, diving, fishing, and Caye/Island-tours, are very accessible. Horseback riding and river tours are also easy to arrange! You can plan day trips to the Mayan ruins, cave tubing, jungle hikes and Animal Rescue/Zoo adventures. Our property Manager, Mirko, is also a licensed
host_about: While we currently call Wisconsin home, we look forward to visiting our “home away from home” in Hopkins, Belize every chance we get. We visited Belize for the first time in 2012 and instantly fell in love with the warm, friendly people; with the beauty and diversity of the landscape with the mountains, jungle, and sea; and of course with the tropical climate that is such a balm from our cold and snowy winters. We’ve visited many Belizean towns and villages over the years but kept coming back to Hopkins. We purchased Mellow Yellow in 2021 after staying in it for one of our visits – the location in the center of the village is ideal, we could tell it was built with care and attention to the details that make a difference, and the views are un-Belize-able!
neighbourhood: Hopkins Village, Stann Creek District, Belize

name: Condo in Caye Caulker · ★3.33 · Studio · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Caye Caulker is a popular destination for scuba drivers, snorkelers, kite surfing, anglers and tourists who just want beach oriented relaxation at budget prices. Although in the past it was a sleepy fishing community, this fun loving island is today known more for its exotic tours to the world's 2nd largest Barrier Reef as well as the famous Hol Chan Reserve. Take  ferry to the Northside Beach or Blu Zen and enjoy the elegant services offered. Take pleasure in visiting Iguana Reef to experience the breathtaking sunset view while catching sight of the seahorses and stingrays.
host_about:
All my Listings are located at Popeyes Beach Condos, Caye Caulker (Formerly known as Coconut Beach Hotel)
Welcome!

name: Guesthouse in Placencia · ★4.91 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Placencia Village is located at the tip of the 23 miles long narrow Placencia peninsula; on one side of the peninsula is the Caribbean ocean and on the other side is the lagoon. One World Rentals is almost at the very end of the road in the heart of actual village.  Everything is close-by.  You will find  a mix of residential and commercial buildings and also a mix of locals and expats. The football field is right across from One World Rentals as well.

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
We are located a 1/2 mile north of the bridge leaving San Pedro, Belize. Our neighborhood is more relaxed than the hustle and bustle of downtown but close enough that you are just a short drive from the many restaurants and activities located in town.
There are three restaurants in the immediate vicinity of the property. The on site bar and restaurant, The Dog House Sports Lounge, is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner (7am – 10pm every day). They have Belizean breakfast dishes and casual bar food and mixed drinks throughout the day.
Just to the north of our property (a 2 minute walk on the beach) is 303 Belize, an over the water bar and restaurant. They are open for lunch and dinner (every day of the week) and focus more on seafood. They have live music most evenings as well. Underneath 303 Belize, is Elite Adventures, a dive and snorkel shop.
Just south of our property is the Farmhouse Market and Cafe. They offer a wide selection of fresh coffees, juices/smoothies,
host_about:
Tres Cocos Resort @ The Cloisters, is a charming family-run establishment where island living meets modern comfort. 
We have fond childhood memories on the property before its transformation into a vacation rental oasis. 
Each condo is individually owned and thoughtfully appointed, ensuring a unique and personalized experience for our guests. We invite you to experience the warmth of Belizean hospitality in every detail during your stay with us.

name: Villa in San Pedro · ★4.89 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Paradise Villas is a 5 minute walk to many grocery stores, banks, dive shops and restaurants.  It's a step away from famous Palapa Bar and Grill, Sand Bar Restaurant, Sandy Toes, Red Ginger Restaurant. Across from  our property on Pescador Drive is Ambergris Hopes Clinic.

I’m an island girl that loves nature. I grew up here on Ambergris Caye in the town of San Pedro so you can call me an island expert.  Feel free to ask me any question, I will be happy to answer you. Travel and meeting people are my passion.  Between my staff and myself we will make sure that your stay with us in an enjoyable one.  Welcome to Ambergris Caye; Welcome to BELIZE.

name: Condo in San Pedro, Ambergris Caye · ★4.80 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
Rental unit in Belize City · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 private bath
Villa in San Pedro · ★4.87 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 3.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
We are in a serene location within close proximity to several well-known resorts/restaurants only a 5 min. golf cart drive or 15 min. walk down the beach. At the end of our driveway there is a local convenience store offering all of the essentials For those looking to explore the reef, we have a reputable dive shop/tour company only a phone call away.
Secret Beach is a 30 min scenic golf cart ride too!
host_about:
Hi, I'm Corrina! 

I grew up outside of Toronto, Ontario but spent most of my adult life in British Columbia, Canada experiencing the fulfilling coastal and mountain culture.

In 2013, I took my first trip to Belize and now spend 6 months of the year on Ambergris Caye where I host a plethora of architecturally stunning oceanfront holiday homes to wonderful guests like you. These homes are ideal and can accommodate anywhere from 8 - 98 guests which are perfect for large groups, weddings, birthdays and other events.  

After a few years, and many guests requesting similar homes and services in the lush mountains of Belize,  I decided to expand our rental inventory and offer our guests a luxurious "Surf n" Turf" package that includes 3-4 nights in one of our island homes and 3-4 nights in one of our lush mountain villas in San Ignacio, Cayo. 
If you desire to experience Belize in a most epic way then we have something for every guest in modern, stylish, safe, comfortable and clean environments within the most desirable communities. 

If I am unable to be on location when guests arrive than one of my representatives will meet/greet you upon arrival, transfer you to our properties, and assist you with anything you may need. Our concierge is the finest!

We can’t wait to meet you and welcome you to beautiful Belize!
See you soon. 

Smiles!

Corrina Taylor

name: Bed and breakfast in Tobacco Caye · ★4.68 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 shared bath
host_about: I love to travel, and there is nothing more that I enjoy than seeing the world, meeting new people, and learning from other cultures.  I live and work in Canada, but my heart is in Belize, where I manage two off-the-grid properties in unique breathtaking locations, with an authentic Belizean flair.

We are a four-minute walk from the water taxi dock and another four-minute walk from the split.

Centrally located you have access to everything Caye Caulker has to offer. We can recommend activities to amplify your visit from fun snorkeling or island retreats.

Rainbow Hotel’s accommodation is one of the few locally own hotels left on the island that has been around for over three decades. The unit’s Coastal island living décor surely sets your mind to relax and go-slow island style.

host_about:
When looking for luxury accommodations in sandy Caye Caulker, Barefoot Caye Caulker Hotel provides the perfect combination of Cozy and Contemporary Suites you deserve on your vacation with plenty of on-site amenities for your convenience and comfort.

Located in the heart of the island’s Front Street, our Newly Renovated property has all the tropical vibes you need in our Six Ocean View Rooms with Private Balcony and Eight Courtyard Units overlooking our brand new pool and deck, including two fully-equipped 2-Bedroom Suites with an open concept living and kitchen space. The airy and open design of our modern hotel surrounded by lush greenery gives our guests the feeling of a private oasis with the convenience of accessing the island’s best restaurants, shops and hot spots the minute you leave the premises.

Come Visit us in Paradise, and don’t forget to Go Barefoot & Go Slow!

name: Boutique hotel in San Pedro · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
We are on the beach with nice ocean views and enjoy a close and convenient location in San Pedro Town.
The Palapa Bar is located on the end of the pier in front of our Inn. Enjoy the cool Carribbean breezes as you enjoy a cocktail or their delicious menu!
2 grocery stores are just 1 block up the street and your suite at Blue Tang Inn has a fully equipped kitchen.
Many shops are located a few blocks down the beach by Central Park.
host_about:
My family owns a small Inn located in Belize on Ambergris Caye, called Blue Tang Inn.
I have been traveling to Belize since 2000. Our Inn has 14 suites located right on the beach in San Pedro Town. 
We have the best staff, who will take great care of all your needs during your stay.  It's nice to have local people around who can direct you to the best places to eat and the most fun tours available. The convenient location, nice room amenities (including full kitchen) and helpful staff make Blue Tang Inn an awesome experience.

name: Condo in Caye Caulker · ★4.66 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Caye Caulker is a popular destination for scuba divers, snorkelers, anglers, and tourists who just want beach-oriented relaxation at budget prices. Although in the past it was a sleepy fishing community, this fun loving island is today known more for its party and night life. Take a ferry to the Northside of the Island and make a stop at Northside Beach or Blu Zen and enjoy the elegant services offered.
host_about:
I’m originally from Iowa, but have been in Colorado for 15 years.  I love traveling and seeing new places.  Recently, I decided to switch things up.  Now, I live in Caye Caulker, Belize part-time.  Come check out this little slice of heaven!  
   Life is short-ENJOY!

neighborhood_overview:
Tara Del Sol is located in a safe and quiet neighborhood, at the end of a "cul-de-sac." Very little traffic passes through this neighborhood, making it a perfect place for families and people looking for tranquillity.

- Some Place South is a fantastic restaurant with an incredible mimosa bar just a short minute walk from Tara Del Sol.
- There is a convenience store around the corner of the resort
- Island Wonder is a beach club located less than a 5-minute walk from the resort
- La Fonda De Nilo is an Argentinian Steak House located close to the resort

There are many more restaurants, bars, stores, tour operators, and more located close to Tara Del Sol

neighborhood_overview: The beautiful windy sunrise and sunsets to singing birds. It's such a Zen feeling. Rusty Blue is in the heart of Ladyville, surrounded by the warm friendly neighbors who’ve lived there a lifetime. Short distance from the International Airport, 1.5 miles from Captain Hooks Restaurant (Pool and Paint Ball Shooting). Multiple grocery stores are within a 5–10-minute walk, a couple restaurants off Northern Highway within 10 minute walk, Bus stops only a 5-10 minute walk, and two gas stations within a 3 minute drive.
host_about: Born and kissed by the Californian sun, raised in Miami and fatherland of Belize. Belize became my tapestry woven with culture, a foundation of belonging and kinship with my roots. In 2005, I gave life to Signature Residence, a corporate housing company rooted in the bustling energy of South Florida. In 2016, my Belizean childhood home was remodeled and is known as RustyBlueBelize. This restoration was a metamorphosis of nostalgia into modernity.

name: Villa in Caye Caulker · ★4.82 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
We are centrally located, just 1.5 blocks from the water taxi piers, down the street from restaurants, snorkel shops, and of course, a one-minute walk to the ocean.

The proximity to everything makes this rental the perfect place to stay during your island vacation getaway.

Caye Caulker is 17 miles north east of Belize City on the mainland and one mile from the second largest barrier reef in the world.

The island is small, with sandy streets, no cars, and maintains a slow laid back lifestyle. It is also known at La Isla Carinosa - which means 'Friendly Island'.
host_about: We have moved from Quebec to Belize to start our dreams of living on the Caribbean Sea and share our home with you.

name: Condo in Caye caulker · ★4.33 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Caye Caulker is a popular destination for scuba divers, snorkelers, anglers, and tourists who just want beach- oriented relaxation at budget prices. Although in the past it was sleepy fishing community, this fun loving island is today known more for its exotic tours to the world's 2nd largest Barrier Reef as well as the famous Hol Chan Marine Reserve. Take a ferry to the northside of the island and make a stop at Northside Beach or Blu Zen and enjoy the elegant services offered. Take pleasure in visiting Iguana Reef to experience the breathtaking sunset view while catching sight of the seahorses and stingrays.
host_about:
Hi , my name is Brandon and my Husband is Adam and we hope to be your host on the magical island of Caye Caulker . We fell in love  with this little island the first time we came here. Now, we are so happy to share our little piece  of this  paradise with you.  If you have the time, read our back ground story  of how we came to be. In mean time cheers to everyone!!! 

All my Listings are located at Popeyes Beach Condos, Caye Caulker which is now officially Gold Standard Certified! Thanks to our Amazing Team.

name: Condo in San Pedro · 5 bedrooms · 10 beds · 4 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The island of Ambergris Caye, “La Isla Bonita”, is a popular tourist destination. You can get here from the mainland either via an 15 minute flight or a 90 minute boat trip.

San Pedro, the only town on the island, has retained its charm while handling the growing number of visitors. Sunset Beach Resort is located 2.5 miles/4 km south of the town core, which means you are away from the crowds yet still within easy reach of everything.

Town is not far away when you want to go in for some live music, shopping, restaurants, etc. But there are things close by too; here are a few things within walking distance of Sunset Beach:

--Suya Tour operator (1 minute walk)
--Marin’s, a small grocery store (2 minute walk)
--A couple of nice restaurants (4-10 minute walk)
--Beach Bar & Grill (15 minute walk; breakfast, lunch, dinner, live music, outdoor bowling)

The Belize Barrier Reef, the longest in the western hemisphere, is just 1/2 mile (
host_about:
I've lived most of my life in the U.S. (where I am from) but have also lived for a couple of months to up to two years in different countries: Germany, Spain, Australia, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, & Belize. Since 2011 I've been living a somewhat nomadic lifestyle while exploring, working & volunteering in new & old places in the Americas and Europe. It's a great way to keep learning!

In my travels I stumbled upon the opportunity to do something that I love -- helping vacation rental owners help people like you with their dream vacations on Ambergris Caye, Belize!

I also have a condo in Cartagena, Colombia; if you're looking for a 30+ night stay (to volunteer; learn Spanish, salsa dancing, or scuba diving; work remotely with a Caribbean view; escape the winter...) let me know!

'Pack for a Purpose' is an organization that links travelers who'd like to help fulfill wish lists of non-profits in developing countries. I partner with them with schools, community organizations & animal rescue groups in both Colombia & Belize. These groups would love to have your help!

Not yet an AirBNB member? Join via this referral link and save $$ on your first booking, maybe even for a stay in Cartagena or Belize! : www.airbnb.com/c/bsmalley

name: Home in San Pedro · ★4.91 · 3 bedrooms · 5 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Sea Grape Drive is one of the main roads starting in the city and leading South to Alaia (1/8 mile) and Mahogany Bay (1 mile).

This is why we purchased a home at this location - we love the city feel and yet so close to the public beaches of Alaia (1/8 mile), and across from Caribbean Villas' free public pool, bar, and beaches.

You are 3 blocks from the European bakery, and a Super Buy grocery store. The house is located on Sea Grape Dr, one of the paved streets! Once you enter the gate to the garden with pool, you'll be amazed at how private, peaceful, and secluded it feels. The entire back yard is enclosed with a wall and fence.

There is no electricity to this end of the Island so it can be dark at night. We have head lamps if you are riding bikes. All our neighbors are on reliable solar too
This is normally a quiet part of the island but AT THIS TIME THERE IS A CONSTRUCTION PROJECT NEXT DOOR AND THERE WILL BE NOISE AFTER 8am
host_about: Hi, I'm Cindy, and along with my husband Don, have retired to our dream home in Belize, where we're starting the next chapter. We've created a hip, chic,and private vacation getaway in an area on Caye Caulker, away from the crowd. We are seasoned travelers and have come to love the small boutique properties around the world and I try very hard to pay attention to detail to bring some luxury to your space while maintaining an eco friendly and responsible environment. We love the laid back vibe of Caye Caulker and I hope you will feel it here too.

Bungalow in Stann Creek District · ★4.80 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in a soon to be gated community across the road from the Jaguar Reef Resort in Hopkins. Called "Hotel Row' we are actually about a kilometre from Hopkins Village. As a guest you are afforded full access to the Jaguar Reef Resort's amenities including bars, pools and dining and the ocean.
host_about: My wife and I are Canadians living in Hopkins for half of the year. The other half of the year we are happy to open our home to guests from all around the world! We are happy to give any tips about local restaurants, bars and excursions. We are just a text away!

name: Guesthouse in Placencia · ★4.44 · 4 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2 baths
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

name: Home in Placencia · ★4.38 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Wonderful quiet property on its on lot. Lots or birds in the tree's as well as the sound of the sea just down the road.

This property is a 2 min walk to the best supermarket in Placencia, as well as located on the start of the famous Placencia Sidewalk. Home to many beachside bars and nightlife as well as gift shops and restaurants.

This truly is in the heart of the village, while feeling very private at the same time.

name: Condo in Placencia · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: Placencia Village is a relaxing atmosphere known for friendly people, beaches, great food, fishing, snorkeling, and love of art; without the hustle & bustle of a commercialized tourist destination.

name: Condo in San Pedro · 3 bedrooms · 5 beds · 3 baths
neighborhood_overview:
San Pedro, Ambergris Caye is accessible from the mainland or International Airport by a 15-minute flight, private helicopter transfer or water taxi. The island is popular for world class diving, fishing and for the largest barrier reef in the Northern Hemisphere.

Sunset Caribe is an easy 1.5 mile golf cart ride North of San Pedro. You will experience the beach luxury of Northern Ambergris Caye while being very close to downtown San Pedro. There are several popular attractions, beach bars and restaurants all around Sunset Caribe!
host_about: My husband and I were born, raised and still live where winters are COLD.  Therefore, we love traveling to our "home away from home" where the weather is just as beautiful as the people!  We hope you make yourself at home and enjoy island living to the fullest!

name: Condo in Placencia · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
host_about:
I have a background in speech pathology and audiology, with a strong interest in education and administration. My work in these fields has taught me the importance of clear communication, safety, and trust - values I carry into my hosting endeavors.

I hope your visit to Belize is filled with adventure, relaxation, and lasting memories.

name: Home in San Pedro · 6 bedrooms · 8 beds · 4.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Get the privacy of a beach home with the amenities of a full-service resort!

name: Villa in Belize · ★4.92 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
host_about:
Hi, I'm Corrina! 

I grew up outside of Toronto, Ontario but spent most of my adult life in British Columbia, Canada experiencing the fulfilling coastal and mountain culture.

In 2013, I took my first trip to Belize and now spend 6 months of the year on Ambergris Caye where I host a plethora of architecturally stunning oceanfront holiday homes to wonderful guests like you. These homes are ideal and can accommodate anywhere from 8 - 98 guests which are perfect for large groups, weddings, birthdays and other events.  

After a few years, and many guests requesting similar homes and services in the lush mountains of Belize,  I decided to expand our rental inventory and offer our guests a luxurious "Surf n" Turf" package that includes 3-4 nights in one of our island homes and 3-4 nights in one of our lush mountain villas in San Ignacio, Cayo. 
If you desire to experience Belize in a most epic way then we have something for every guest in modern, stylish, safe, comfortable and clean environments within the most desirable communities. 

If I am unable to be on location when guests arrive than one of my representatives will meet/greet you upon arrival, transfer you to our properties, and assist you with anything you may need. Our concierge is the finest!

We can’t wait to meet you and welcome you to beautiful Belize!
See you soon. 

Smiles!

Corrina Taylor

name: Bungalow in San Ignacio · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Our closest neighbor is about 150ft away from the home which gives guest enough privacy. For the most part the neighborhood is quiet but the songs of birds are always the first thing you can hear in the morning

name: Condo in San Pedro · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to Caribeville, a planned community established in 2006. Located just 2 miles north of San Pedro town, Caribeville lies between the peaceful bayside and magnificent blue ocean. Constructed by one of the premier developers of vacation property in Belize, SMVNF Investments, Caribeville consists of Grand Caribe resort, Sunset Caribe resort, Rain Restaurant, Aqua Seafood and Steakhouse, San Pedro Urgent Care, Beach Basket Grocery store and Grande Caribe Realty. Also apart of the Caribeville community is Astrum Helicopters in San Pedro town. With everything one could need in one great located, the population of Caribeville is truly a happy one!
host_about: Hi! Ann, Alan and John and I have been friends for years. We traveled to San Pedro during Covid because  getting in and out of the country at that time was not impossible. The four of us fell in love with the island vibe, the people and the food. Alan and I fell for the diving! So, on our first-ever trip to Belize the four of us bought Sunset Serenity and cannot wait to spend many years enjoying everthing Ambergris Caye has to offer.

name: Boutique hotel in Hopkins · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview:
Hopkins, Belize is a coastal village in southern Belize. Hopkins is known for it's warm hospitality, beautiful coastline and unique Garifuna culture. Hopkins was recently voted "The Friendliest Village in Belize" by Belize's First Magazine.

Hopkins boasts a rustic local vibe with many local and upscale restaurants, small bars and gift shops.

Excursions from Hopkins are endless. You can enjoy scuba diving, Discover Scuba (if not certified), ziplining and hiking at Bocawina Rainforest, Mayan Chocolate tour, Cave tubing, snorkeling, bird watching, island hoping, fishing, Maya River tours, monkey river tour in Placencia and much more.

If you prefer to rest and relax, you may enjoy miles of public beaches. The local beaches are open to all guests.

For ultimate relaxation, lounge on the rooftop deck at Shedrock Shangrila where you can pull up a lounger, take a dip in the pool and enjoy a cool beverage while enjoying a breathtaking 360 d
host_about:
We live in a suburb outside San Antonio, Texas and had a crazy dream of partially retiring on the Caribbean…. And, even crazier…. We did it!!!  I learned how to scuba dive after buying the property here and we so enjoy the hobby!!!

A native Texan with 6 children and 9 grandbabies!!!!  We are loving our retired life!!!

name: Bed and breakfast in San Pedro · 5 bedrooms · 5 beds · 6 baths
host_about:
Hi, I'm Corrina! 

I grew up outside of Toronto, Ontario but spent most of my adult life in British Columbia, Canada experiencing the fulfilling coastal and mountain culture.

In 2013, I took my first trip to Belize and now spend 6 months of the year on Ambergris Caye where I host a plethora of architecturally stunning oceanfront holiday homes to wonderful guests like you. These homes are ideal and can accommodate anywhere from 8 - 98 guests which are perfect for large groups, weddings, birthdays and other events.  

After a few years, and many guests requesting similar homes and services in the lush mountains of Belize,  I decided to expand our rental inventory and offer our guests a luxurious "Surf n" Turf" package that includes 3-4 nights in one of our island homes and 3-4 nights in one of our lush mountain villas in San Ignacio, Cayo. 
If you desire to experience Belize in a most epic way then we have something for every guest in modern, stylish, safe, comfortable and clean environments within the most desirable communities. 

If I am unable to be on location when guests arrive than one of my representatives will meet/greet you upon arrival, transfer you to our properties, and assist you with anything you may need. Our concierge is the finest!

We can’t wait to meet you and welcome you to beautiful Belize!
See you soon. 

Smiles!

Corrina Taylor

name: Condo in San Pedro · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: Diamante is located on the South end of town and a stone’s throw from the island’s airstrip and next door to the famous, The Blue Water Grill. Right on the corner heading to the main street, there is Walk- Mart Supermarket where you can shop all variety of groceries. Infront of Walk Mart there is Carlo & Ernie’s Runway bar, enjoy a great meal while having the view of the San Pedro Airstrip. And looking for an ATM? At the Sancas Plaza which is in front of the Tropic air Airport (3mins walking from US) there is an ATM. Being in the heart of San Pedro is convenient to our guest since you will have access to amazing restaurants with amazing views, steps away from all the activity in Town and from dive shops for a numerous list of excursions you can do.

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★3.60 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

name: Tiny home in San Pedro · ★4.80 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath

name: Rental unit in San Ignacio · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The town is about a 1/4 mile away and the center is about 3/4 mile. It is easily walked but a taxi only cost $5 USD for up to 4 persons.
host_about: I like to travel... currently at 40 countries. This year will complete 50 years living and/or working in Belize. My wife Suzi and I have raised a family of 5 kids, who in turn, have married to people from 5 countries.  Suzi and I both love music, nature,  and cultural foods.  Our passion is striving to make the world a better place, one step at a time. I am involved in the new Organic Foods movement and the Wellness movement in Belize.  Together Suzi and I have built the Maya Mountain Lodge that has 45 years serving visitors to Belize. Now Covid has created new opportunities to serve others.

Overlooking the Caribbean Sea, The Tree Tops stirs a tasty mélange of Caribbean, Belizean and Italian design elements to create the perfect spot to unwind.

The pure, crisp white structure sits within earshot of the Ocean crashing waves.

name: Rental unit in Caye Caulker · ★3.0 · Studio · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Caye Caulker is a popular destination for scuba divers, snorkelers, anglers, and tourists who just want beach-oriented relaxation at budget prices. Take a ferry to the Northside of the Island and make a stop at Northside Beach or Blu Zen and enjoy the elegant services offered.

name: Bungalow in Ladyville · ★4.38 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Quiet Neighborhood away from the busyness of everything.
host_about:
We are both Government Employees, Entrepreneurs and I am former Military Brat. As Parents and Grandparents, we enjoy traveling, Community Service and Philanthropy.

Our goal is to help other traveling professionals with a comforting and tranquil place to stay. As a result, in California, we offer spaces specifically for SINGLE occupancy, Nurses, Military Personnel, Refinery Workers, and other Professionals that are constantly on the road for work or leisure. In Georgia, 
and Belize we offer a space specifically for small groups of Families and Friends. These Beach locations are full of high profile guest and ideal for small wedding parties. 

Our purpose is to give back to our fellow hard working, dedicated, colleagues by providing low cost rooms and a warm places to rest. We definitely understand the need for a home like feeling while traveling. Stay with us, relax, replenish and come back “home” again.

Take a ferry to the Northside of the Island and make a stop at Northside Beach or Blu Zen and enjoy the elegant services offered.
host_about:
Hi , my name is Brandon and my Husband is Adam and we hope to be your host on the magical island of Caye Caulker . We fell in love  with this little island the first time we came here. Now, we are so happy to share our little piece  of this  paradise with you.  If you have the time, read our back ground story  of how we came to be. In mean time cheers to everyone!!! 

All my Listings are located at Popeyes Beach Condos, Caye Caulker which is now officially Gold Standard Certified! Thanks to our Amazing Team.

neighborhood_overview:
Mahogany Bay Village, Ambergris Caye's premier community.

M&B Luxury Vacation rental guest do not have access to the Mahogany Bay Resort pool or private beach BUT we are building our own Pool Club & Club House and a check-in booth for our guest! It is not yet open but should be in the next few months

Start your day with your favorite coffee drink at Rum+Bean, grab some tacos or empanadas for lunch, and dine on the freshest sushi imaginable at JYOTO Japanese restaurant by evening. You can even satisfy your sweet tooth at our dessert shop serving homemade ice cream and gourmet donuts. Be sure to sample some of the expertly-crafted cocktails using fresh fruit, housemade infusions, local Belizean liquors, and a whole lot of love at one of the FIVE bars on-site.

From the beautiful beaches and azure waters of the Caribbean, to the Maya Mountains and the Pine Ridge, we have an adventure for everyone. Spectacular caves, winding waterfalls, virgin tropical rainf
host_about:
Hi my name is Elliott Budd, I am the director of M&B Management Ltd. I am born and raised in the "Belizean Jewel", Ambergris Caye, Belize. 

I have made a career in hospitality and have had the pleasure of managing a couple resorts. My true passion is to make everyone that we have visit our island enjoy it as much as I do! Whatever your dream adventure may involve, my team and I are here to make it happen! We provide concierge, front desk and reservation assistance. Unlike any other AirBnb property, we include these services FREE OF CHARGE!

name: Vacation home in Bullet Tree Falls · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Bullet Tree Falls is a village in Cayo District of western Belize. The village is located in the foothills of the Maya Mountains and has a population of about 3000 people, mostly Spanish-speaking mestizos. There is also a significant population of American and Canadian ex-pats living in the area.

The village is located along the verdant Mopan River about a 10-minute drive from San Ignacio Town. The two sides of the village are connected by the single-lane Salvador Fernandez Bridge.
host_about: I am the author of the book: The Ultimate Belize Bucket List. I am also the founder of BelizeHub.com. I am passionate about all things Belizean and I use my creative efforts to position Belize as one of the best places to visit in the world. I live in the quaint community of Bullet Tree Falls, near San Ignacio Town in western Belize.
neighbourhood: Bullet Tree Falls, Cayo District, Belize

name: Condo in San Pedro · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
San Pedro, Ambergris Caye is accessible from the mainland or International Airport by a 15-minute flight, private helicopter transfer or water taxi. The island is popular for world class diving, fishing and for the largest barrier reef in the Northern Hemisphere.

Sunset Caribe is an easy 1.5 mile golf cart ride North of San Pedro. You will experience the beach luxury of Northern Ambergris Caye while being very close to downtown San Pedro. There are several popular attractions, beach bars and restaurants all around Sunset Caribe!

name: Home in Caye Caulker · ★4.96 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Central location in the village, one block (250ft) from the sea.  It is on a corner - of course! We are on the main street through the village, so on our block we have a shop and the clinic and other neighbours, in the next block north is where there are a few independent restaurants / cafes, and in the next block again is the heart of the village where it gets busier, the water taxis and there is more businesses than homes.  That stretches north all the way to the split.  To the south is gets quieter generally with more homes and fewer businesses.
host_about: Still loving Caye Caulker after 22 years with my critters! Amanda

name: Hotel in Caye Caulker · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview:
Overlooking the Caribbean Sea, The Tree Tops stirs a tasty mélange of Caribbean, Belizean and Italian design elements to create the perfect spot to unwind.

The pure, crisp white structure sits within earshot of the Ocean crashing waves.

All room have a distinctly Caribbean interior style, with breezy burlap linen curtains and nostalgic yet highly functional overhead ceiling fans.

name: Rental unit in Placencia · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Lazy Palm Suites is in the heart of charming Placencia Village. The famous "Sidewalk" is 50 feet from the entrance. Placencia Village is filled with shops, restaurants, tour companies and grocery stores... everything you could want within a 10 minute walk. Toucan Jacks- a wonderful watering hole is 15 feet from the building so you can enjoy cocktails all day with your feet in the sand!

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: Diamante is located on the South end of town and a stone’s throw from the island’s airstrip and next door to the famous, The Blue Water Grill. Right on the corner heading to the main street, there is Walk- Mart Supermarket where you can shop all variety of groceries. Infront of Walk Mart there is Carlo & Ernie’s Runway bar, enjoy a great meal while having the view of the San Pedro Airstrip. And looking for an ATM? At the Sancas Plaza which is in front of the Tropic air Airport (3mins walking from US) there is an ATM. Being in the heart of San Pedro is convenient to our guest since you will have access to amazing restaurants with amazing views, steps away from all the activity in Town and from dive shops for a numerous list of excursions you can do.

name: Cabin in San Ignacio · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
host_about: I like to travel... currently at 40 countries. This year will complete 50 years living and/or working in Belize. My wife Suzi and I have raised a family of 5 kids, who in turn, have married to people from 5 countries.  Suzi and I both love music, nature,  and cultural foods.  Our passion is striving to make the world a better place, one step at a time. I am involved in the new Organic Foods movement and the Wellness movement in Belize.  Together Suzi and I have built the Maya Mountain Lodge that has 45 years serving visitors to Belize. Now Covid has created new opportunities to serve others.

Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

Home in San Ignacio · 2 bedrooms · 1 bath
Hotel in Placencia · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 private bath
Villa in Belize · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The Macal River Valley in Cayo boasts some of the best natural landscapes in the entire country of Belize. This, combined with a culture for clean living, outdoor activities, and amazing climate has caused this area to become home to some of the most exclusive resorts in Belize. The developers selected this site; in the heart of the high-end resort corridor in the Cayo District and just a stone’s throw from the area’s only municipal airport, major roads, and other amenities. This amazing site, between the two communities of San Ignacio and Benque Viejo makes it the premier address in Cayo.
From cave-tubing to rappelling down a waterfall, the Cayo district has much to offer in the way of adventure. Our concierge’s will prepare a day full of excitement for you with excursions all over the district — all you have to do is ask.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Corrina! 

I grew up outside of Toronto, Ontario but spent most of my adult life in British Columbia, Canada experiencing the fulfilling coastal and mountain culture.

In 2013, I took my first trip to Belize and now spend 6 months of the year on Ambergris Caye where I host a plethora of architecturally stunning oceanfront holiday homes to wonderful guests like you. These homes are ideal and can accommodate anywhere from 8 - 98 guests which are perfect for large groups, weddings, birthdays and other events.  

After a few years, and many guests requesting similar homes and services in the lush mountains of Belize,  I decided to expand our rental inventory and offer our guests a luxurious "Surf n" Turf" package that includes 3-4 nights in one of our island homes and 3-4 nights in one of our lush mountain villas in San Ignacio, Cayo. 
If you desire to experience Belize in a most epic way then we have something for every guest in modern, stylish, safe, comfortable and clean environments within the most desirable communities. 

If I am unable to be on location when guests arrive than one of my representatives will meet/greet you upon arrival, transfer you to our properties, and assist you with anything you may need. Our concierge is the finest!

We can’t wait to meet you and welcome you to beautiful Belize!
See you soon. 

Smiles!

Corrina Taylor

name: Hotel in Placencia · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview:
Set back about 100 yards from Placencia road as well as the famous Placencia sidewalk, nestled in jungle inspiring giant ficus trees you will find the neighborhood of "Bakadeer" as the locals refer to it, or Garden Grove as online maps will show. The leeward side of the peninsula offers calmer seas as shelter from prevailing winds gifts us with cool breezes as well as serene panoramic views of Placencia Harbor and the sapphire Caribbean Sea.

Our unique location allows us to offer a peaceful stay just a short walk from the bustling village, with no need for a vehicle as everything you need is within walking distance. Restaurants, Markets, Fruit Stands, Nightlife, Gelato, its all right here! Many excursions and tours leave from the municipal pier which is a short 3 minute stroll away!

name: Condo in San Pedro · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Everything is on site to provide the best vacation experience, such as a restaurant, bar, pools, beach and ocean, golf carts for rents, diving and touring shop, spa/massage service, complimentary use of kayaks and bikes. Plus, the most friendly and helpful staff on the island.

On a golf cart, we are at 20-25 minutes of Secret Beach (amazing place) and at about 30-35 minutes of the village. There are a few bars, restaurants and other resorts around. Riding on a golf cart is really the best way to explore the island and discover everything Ambergris Caye has to offer.
host_about: My wife of 29 years & I are from the Kansas City, Missouri. I am an avid golfer. We both love the warm weather & have a passion for the beach! This, along with the laid back vibe, English speaking, ease of using US currency, & incredibly friendly locals are some of the reasons we fell in love with Belize & decided to invest in our own little slice of paradise! We welcome you to enjoy what we love so much!

host_about: I’m Kathy, a professional property manager.  I am a Belize resident and split time between Placencia and Texas. I have been travelling to and vacationing in Placencia Belize for more than 20 years now and started renting our first villa in 2008. Our passion is to help other families explore all Placencia has to offer, while offering convenient and resort-style amenities to enhance the vacation experience. We look forward to your questions!

name: Villa in Placencia · ★4.88 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2.5 baths
Rental unit in Caye Caulker · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Boat in San Pedro · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
host_about:
Hi, I'm Corrina! 

I grew up outside of Toronto, Ontario but spent most of my adult life in British Columbia, Canada experiencing the fulfilling coastal and mountain culture.

In 2013, I took my first trip to Belize and now spend 6 months of the year on Ambergris Caye where I host a plethora of architecturally stunning oceanfront holiday homes to wonderful guests like you. These homes are ideal and can accommodate anywhere from 8 - 98 guests which are perfect for large groups, weddings, birthdays and other events.  

After a few years, and many guests requesting similar homes and services in the lush mountains of Belize,  I decided to expand our rental inventory and offer our guests a luxurious "Surf n" Turf" package that includes 3-4 nights in one of our island homes and 3-4 nights in one of our lush mountain villas in San Ignacio, Cayo. 
If you desire to experience Belize in a most epic way then we have something for every guest in modern, stylish, safe, comfortable and clean environments within the most desirable communities. 

If I am unable to be on location when guests arrive than one of my representatives will meet/greet you upon arrival, transfer you to our properties, and assist you with anything you may need. Our concierge is the finest!

We can’t wait to meet you and welcome you to beautiful Belize!
See you soon. 

Smiles!

Corrina Taylor

name: Place to stay in Caye Caulker · ★5.0 · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Costa Nube is located just south of the air strip. All properties in the area are off grid utilizing solar for energy and rain catch for water supply. As a collective, water & electricity conservation efforts are important. Enjoy the nature paths through the southern part of the island.  Take one of the paddle boards out to the sea. We are minutes from the village for dinning, shopping, day activities,  tours, or nightlife. Once back at Costa Nube enjoy the serenity & beauty of the mangrove reserve.
host_about:
We’re Aldo & Kolleen from Las Vegas,USA. We came to this beautiful Island 8 years ago and decided to make it our new home.  We love traveling, food, drinks and entertainment ☺️.
We live here on site to ensure your stay is more rewarding and the off grid equipment works efficiently.

neighborhood_overview:
Our rentals are located in the Surfside community of Placencia, across from a beautiful semi-private beach that is available to our guests. This is an ideal neighborhood for families to enjoy as it is peaceful, safe and just outside of the downtown core. We are currently working on building a playground on the grounds and so far have quite a few swings and hammocks in the yard. We will be adding a pool soon. In the meantime however, located next door is a large resort open to the public.

Therefore, in a three minute walk you will find mini golf, a swimming pool, full day spa, restaurant, martini bar, tennis courts, pickle ball, delicious gelato and another beautiful beach to enjoy. The resorts amenities are available for day use at a small fee. For example, mini golf is $10 BZ for kids, $20BZ for adults, the pool is free with the purchase of a meal and so on.

We are also happy to provide recommendations and arrange pick up for local tours and services. We

name: Boutique hotel in Placencia · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
Villa in Stann Creek District · ★4.85 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The Plantation area of Northern Placencia is a quiet, relaxed nook of the Placencia peninsula where the land narrows and sunrise and sunset can be witnessed from one property! As with all beaches in Belize, the seafront and beach in front of Breeze of Paradise are public but rarely used (owing to the lack of hotels in the area) which allows for the ultimate in tranquillity. The overall feeling of Plantation is one of rest, nature and relaxation.

Plantation is the sleepy neighbour to the up and coming village of Maya Beach to the south and family-centred community of Riversdale to the north. Your neighbours are a considerable distance away as Breeze of Paradise sits in a fenced double lot.

The world famous Cockscomb Basin Wildlife Sanctuary, which houses over 300 species of birds plus jaguars, tapir and pumas, Mayan World waterfalls, ziplining, cave tubing, ATV jungle adventuring and horseback riding, Ya'axkin Butterfly Farm and world class diving at the Barrier Re

neighborhood_overview:
The villas are located 3.3 miles north of "the bridge" or 4 miles from the centre of town. It's situated in a location that's just far enough away from the hustle and bustle but is still only a short drive into town. The villas are only a short.5 mile drive to the Secret Beach road.

There is a restaurant and bar right next door at Las Terrazas on the south side of the property, there are several others within a short distance. By cart you have numerous other options between north of the bridge, places like Portofino, Truck Stop, Stella's Smile, Paco's Tiki Bar, Marbucks, Reefers Restaurant and Beach Bar, Rain, Aji Tapa Lounge, Garage Seafood and Steakhouse, Pirates Treasure, Rum Dog, Dive Bar and more. All of the places listed are within a 15-minute golf cart ride of Solaria Villas. Our Mobile Guest App lists all of our favourites and more and is integrated with GMaps so you'll have no problem finding them.

name: Home in San Ignacio · 4 bedrooms · 4 beds · 4.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Casa Suzie's location is truly unbeatable. You're just a short drive or a leisurely walk away from the vibrant streets of downtown San Ignacio. Explore local markets, sample delicious Belizean cuisine, and immerse yourself in the culture and history of this charming town. Yet, when you return to Casa Suzie, you'll find yourself in a tranquil oasis, far removed from the hustle and bustle. Casa Suzie is directly across from the San Ignacio Resort and Hotel and Princess Casino.
host_about: Born and raised in Belize, we moved to Florida to attend college.  Our roots remain strong in Belize and we love sharing our passion for our country with the world!

name: Vacation home in Bullet Tree Falls · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Bullet Tree Falls is a village in Cayo District of western Belize. The village is located in the foothills of the Maya Mountains and has a population of about 3000 people, mostly Spanish-speaking mestizos. There is also a significant population of American and Canadian ex-pats living in the area.

The village is located along the verdant Mopan River about a 10-minute drive from San Ignacio Town. The two sides of the village are connected by the single-lane Salvador Fernandez Bridge.
host_about: I am the author of the book: The Ultimate Belize Bucket List. I am also the founder of BelizeHub.com. I am passionate about all things Belizean and I use my creative efforts to position Belize as one of the best places to visit in the world. I live in the quaint community of Bullet Tree Falls, near San Ignacio Town in western Belize.
neighbourhood: Bullet Tree Falls, Cayo District, Belize

name: Bed and breakfast in Belize City · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Villa in San Pedro · ★4.33 · 4 bedrooms · 5 beds · 4.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
We are in a serene location away from the popular and colorful town of San Pedro, yet close enough to enjoy the restaurants, bars, shops & boutiques that it offers. There are also several well-known resorts/restaurants only a 5 min drive or a 15 min walk down the beach as well as local convenience stores and tour/dive shops.
Secret Beach is a 30-40 min scenic golf cart ride.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Corrina! 

I grew up outside of Toronto, Ontario but spent most of my adult life in British Columbia, Canada experiencing the fulfilling coastal and mountain culture.

In 2013, I took my first trip to Belize and now spend 6 months of the year on Ambergris Caye where I host a plethora of architecturally stunning oceanfront holiday homes to wonderful guests like you. These homes are ideal and can accommodate anywhere from 8 - 98 guests which are perfect for large groups, weddings, birthdays and other events.  

After a few years, and many guests requesting similar homes and services in the lush mountains of Belize,  I decided to expand our rental inventory and offer our guests a luxurious "Surf n" Turf" package that includes 3-4 nights in one of our island homes and 3-4 nights in one of our lush mountain villas in San Ignacio, Cayo. 
If you desire to experience Belize in a most epic way then we have something for every guest in modern, stylish, safe, comfortable and clean environments within the most desirable communities. 

If I am unable to be on location when guests arrive than one of my representatives will meet/greet you upon arrival, transfer you to our properties, and assist you with anything you may need. Our concierge is the finest!

We can’t wait to meet you and welcome you to beautiful Belize!
See you soon. 

Smiles!

Corrina Taylor

host_about:
After years of dreaming of living in the tropics we now call belize home, after spending most of our lives on the west coast of Canada 

We are Kim, Dean &  Kyley and we love getting to connect with so many of you while you explore this paradise we call home! 

You will often be chatting with Kyley online but you will likely come in contact with all three of us at some point ! We are more the happy to answer any questions! Happy travels!

Infront of Walk Mart there is Carlo & Ernie’s Runway bar, enjoy a great meal while having the view of the San Pedro Airstrip. And looking for an ATM? name: Condo in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
South San Pedro is a safe and quiet community with the South Ambergris Caye Neighborhood Watch just footsteps away from Miramar Villas. With 4 restaurants and a small grocery store in a close distance for your convenience.
Just walk across the street and have breakfast at Southern Charm Restaurant or enjoy dinner at Black Orchid Restaurant.
Drive to Some Place South Cafe/Bar and enjoy your favorite Mimosa or feeling like having a juicy hamburger you definitely need to go hang out at TOAST. Gaby the bartender will sure make sure you have a lovely meal and makes the best drinks.
If you feel like having an upscale adult dinner drive south to Playa De Sala where you will enjoy the beautiful beach and wonderful food.

name: Condo in Caye Caulker · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
Condo in San Pedro · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The island of Ambergris Caye, “La Isla Bonita”, is a popular tourist destination. You can get here from the mainland either via an 15 minute flight or a 90 minute boat trip.

San Pedro, the only town on the island, has retained its charm while handling the growing number of visitors. Miramar is located 2.5 miles/4 km south of the town core, which means you are away from the crowds yet still within easy reach of everything.

Town is not far away when you want to go in for some live music, shopping, restaurants, etc. But there are things close by too; here are a few things within walking distance of Miramar:

--Suya Tour operator (2 minute walk)
--Marin’s, a small grocery store (4 minute walk)
--A couple of nice restaurants (2-10 minute walk)
--Beach Bar & Grill (15 minute walk; breakfast, lunch, dinner, live music, outdoor bowling)

The Belize Barrier Reef, the longest in the western hemisphere, is just 1/2 mile (1 km) off shore.
host_about:
I've lived most of my life in the U.S. (where I am from) but have also lived for a couple of months to up to two years in different countries: Germany, Spain, Australia, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, & Belize. Since 2011 I've been living a somewhat nomadic lifestyle while exploring, working & volunteering in new & old places in the Americas and Europe. It's a great way to keep learning!

In my travels I stumbled upon the opportunity to do something that I love -- helping vacation rental owners help people like you with their dream vacations on Ambergris Caye, Belize!

I also have a condo in Cartagena, Colombia; if you're looking for a 30+ night stay (to volunteer; learn Spanish, salsa dancing, or scuba diving; work remotely with a Caribbean view; escape the winter...) let me know!

'Pack for a Purpose' is an organization that links travelers who'd like to help fulfill wish lists of non-profits in developing countries. I partner with them with schools, community organizations & animal rescue groups in both Colombia & Belize. These groups would love to have your help!

Not yet an AirBNB member? Join via this referral link and save $$ on your first booking, maybe even for a stay in Cartagena or Belize! : www.airbnb.com/c/bsmalley

name: Cottage in Gales Point · ★4.67 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: Deedee's Beach front Cabana is a unique, spacious and remote setting located 15-20 mins Drive from Gales Point Village into the beach road (Dave's Folly Road) and approx. 1 hr. and 45 mins drive from Belize's International Airport. It is located in the Central Coast of Belize Du East Side of the Southern Manatee Lagoon. The best way to get to property is by making arrangements for pickups a the Int'l Airport with the manager. Kindly note that car rental options is just one phone call away from the property. Lastly, once guests arrive to Belize City (if Covid19 is not a concern) public transportation can be taken from the bus terminal in order to reach to La Democracia Village Junction where we can pick you up. ** Public Transportation occurs every hour and it does not take you all the way into Gales Point village. A transportation fee, however, will still be applicable for the 45 minutes off-road drive to get you from la Democracia village Junction to our property.

name: Boutique hotel in San Pedro · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
We are on the beach with nice ocean views and enjoy a close and convenient location in San Pedro Town.
The Palapa Bar is located on the end of the pier in front of our Inn. Enjoy the cool Carribbean breezes as you enjoy a cocktail or their delicious menu!
2 grocery stores are just 1 block up the street and your suite at Blue Tang Inn has a fully equipped kitchen.
Many shops are located a few blocks down the beach by Central Park.
host_about:
My family owns a small Inn located in Belize on Ambergris Caye, called Blue Tang Inn.
I have been traveling to Belize since 2000. Our Inn has 14 suites located right on the beach in San Pedro Town. 
We have the best staff, who will take great care of all your needs during your stay.  It's nice to have local people around who can direct you to the best places to eat and the most fun tours available. The convenient location, nice room amenities (including full kitchen) and helpful staff make Blue Tang Inn an awesome experience.

PUR Hotels are a collection of two properties in Belize. PUR Boutique Cabanas are the newest, adults-only, boutique cabanas on the tropical island of Ambergris Caye, Belize. We have wonderful, personable staff who will be in touch to get your prepared for your vacation with us!

name: Vacation home in Caye Caulker · 5 bedrooms · 9 beds · 4 baths
neighborhood_overview: Just off the coast of the Belize mainland, on the rustic and charming island of Caye Caulker is Blu Zen. A boutique resort situated on the beach with breath taking views of the World’s Second largest Barrier Reef and refreshing tropical breeze. Blu Zen is peace and serenity in the Caribbean. Relaxed and intimate with the unique address location between reef and white sands. Invigorated by the endless possibilities of exciting reef water activities and beautiful scenery to feast the eyes and adventures to fill your soul. All just moments away in any direction. Get away from it all! Come find your peace at Blu Zen Hotel and Resort in Caye Caulker Belize.
host_about: We enjoy welcoming guests from all over the world.

name: casa particular in Belize District · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
Rental unit in Placencia · ★4.71 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Villa in Ambergris Caye · ★5.0 · 4 bedrooms · 7 beds · 4.5 baths
host_about:
Hi, I'm Corrina! 

I grew up outside of Toronto, Ontario but spent most of my adult life in British Columbia, Canada experiencing the fulfilling coastal and mountain culture.

In 2013, I took my first trip to Belize and now spend 6 months of the year on Ambergris Caye where I host a plethora of architecturally stunning oceanfront holiday homes to wonderful guests like you. These homes are ideal and can accommodate anywhere from 8 - 98 guests which are perfect for large groups, weddings, birthdays and other events.  

After a few years, and many guests requesting similar homes and services in the lush mountains of Belize,  I decided to expand our rental inventory and offer our guests a luxurious "Surf n" Turf" package that includes 3-4 nights in one of our island homes and 3-4 nights in one of our lush mountain villas in San Ignacio, Cayo. 
If you desire to experience Belize in a most epic way then we have something for every guest in modern, stylish, safe, comfortable and clean environments within the most desirable communities. 

If I am unable to be on location when guests arrive than one of my representatives will meet/greet you upon arrival, transfer you to our properties, and assist you with anything you may need. Our concierge is the finest!

We can’t wait to meet you and welcome you to beautiful Belize!
See you soon. 

Smiles!

Corrina Taylor

name: Resort in San Pedro · ★4.78 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview:
If it is your first time on the island (the 2013 & 2014 #1 island in the world!) - please note - the water in San Pedro is some of the prettiest water in the world, with perfect white sand, but because it is an island, the shore takes a beating from the sea, and much of the beachfront is seawalls and piers. Because we are close to the reef, there can be seagrass that washes in. However - the swimmable beaches we have - are gorgeous. All beaches in Belize are public, so you are welcome to walk freely on all the beachfront. Although many resorts are located on the beach, there are only a few spots people actually swim in the sea. Here are the popular spots to swim:
--You can walk right to the shore, and walk the beautiful, picturesque beach front.
--You can swim off the dock we have.
--Head to Boca Del Rio to Sandy Toes to sit on the shore, or Palapa Bar to swim in the tubes on the sea.
--For a full beach day experience - especially if there is sea grass on the Carib

name: Home in Corozal · 8 bedrooms · 8 beds · 9 baths
host_about: I am a Belizean-Californian who's family is originally from Corozal Belize. During the height of the pandemic I returned to Belize seeking refuge from pandemonium. I originally planned to visit a nearby island, but I found peace and tranquility in Corozal. I've made many friends and have been on many adventures in Corozal District. My hope is to extend this experience to guest, whether they be passing though or here on an extended stay.

name: Villa in San Pedro · ★4.96 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Take the road less traveled, to the Habaneros region and find a private estate, on millionaires row, 9 miles north of San Pedro town on Ambergris Caye North. Discover, quaint and rustic restaurants, off-the-beaten path.

Restaurants available just South of us and Chat and Chill to the North, just a 300 yard walk up the beach.
5 Min Golf Cart Ride North to El Norte.
10 minute or less golf cart ride to Costa Blue & X'tan Ha.
15 minute golf cart ride North on the beach to Tranquility Bay.
20 minutes north to Margaritaville (coming in December).
20 minutes from Secret Beach (a slew of restaurants to choose from).
20 minutes from Mambo (One of my personal favorites!)
30 minutes to Truck Stop and the Garage (A Myriad of vendors).

Local Groceries are found just 1/4 mile down the road from your villa. Bonitos Grocery and two other bodega groceries all within 5 minutes.

We are just steps from the untouched turquoise ocean
host_about:
A Jersey native and self proclaimed pizza-bagel, with a passion for food, travel, fashion, estate sales, & interior design!
I currently work in luxury real estate, design, & love what I do!
Traveling has always been the epicenter of my life and I am thrilled to assist others with a passion for travel to experience the discovery, beauty, & adventure Belize has to offer!  
Our ultimate goal is to make your stay as enjoyable as possible!

name: Condo in Placencia · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Located on a private island at the end of a dead-end street, it is always quiet and peaceful. As you will see on the map and in the pictures, our pontoon boat takes you across the 80 ft canal which provides easy access to town, an easy 5 minute walk to all the village has to offer. This unique aspect is the reason we love this location providing privacy, breath-taking views, and ease of access to town.

name: Villa in Seine Bight · 4 bedrooms · 5 beds · 2.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Ceiba Beach Resort is located in the heart of Maya Beach on the beautiful Placencia Peninsula in Belize. Located at the edge of the Caribbean sea, you are just a few steps away from the sandy beach and amazing sunrises. Enjoy our on site pool with swim-up bar and restaurant, perfect to unwind after adventuring in Belize. For a bit of diversity during a long stay, Mangos restaurant is right next door, local favorite RumBum is just across the street, and Jaguar Lanes Bowling is a block away.
neighbourhood: Seine Bight, Stann Creek District, Belize

name: Villa in Rancho Dolores · 3 bedrooms · 6 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: **OFF GRID ** PERFECT FOR CONNECTING INLAND & EXPERIENCING THE JUNGLE ESPECIALLY IF WANTED TO EXPERIENCE A DIFFERENT SIDE TO BELIZEAN CULTURE. Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay in the middle of the Mayan Rainforest. Most inland adventure requires some driving and will not take quickly to get there no matter what location you are traveling from. However you can enjoy a scenic drive through the villages and towns while sightseeing what Belize has to offer. We are 50minutes from the international airport  ,  Jaguar Paw cave tubing 1hr 18 min The Belize zoo 58 min, Ayinha Lamanai Temple 27 min then an additional 20 minute boat ride from Ayinha,Belize city 1hr, Baboon Sanctuary 17min, Crooked Tree Wildlife Sanctuary 1hr 15min, Altun Ha Temples 1hr 9 min,Bacab Ecological Water Park 43min, Old Belize Museum & Beach 53min, Belize museum 1hr 6min, Belize Water Taxi 1hr 8min, xunantinich 2hr 40min, Mountain Pine Ridge 2hr 37min, Placencia 3hr 20 min, Hopkins 2hr 29min, S
neighbourhood: Rancho Dolores, Orange Walk District, Belize

name: Rental unit in San Ignacio · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Rental unit in Gales Point · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
neighborhood_overview: Beach front Cabana is a unique, spacious and remote setting located 15-20 mins Drive from Gales Point Village into the beach road (Dave's Folly Road) and approx. 1 hr. and 45 mins drive from Belize's International Airport. It is located in the Central Coast of Belize Du East Side of the Southern Manatee Lagoon. The best way to get to property is by making arrangements for pickups a the Int'l Airport with the manager. Kindly note that car rental options is just one phone call away from the property. Lastly, once guests arrive to Belize City (if Covid19 is not a concern) public transportation can be taken from the bus terminal in order to reach to La Democracia Village Junction where we can pick you up. ** Public Transportation occurs every hour and it does not take you all the way into Gales Point village. A transportation fee, however, will still be applicable for the 45 minutes off-road drive to get you from la Democracia village Junction to our property. Tours to Gales point Village
